This hotel have great amenities with breathtaking views. At night dont forget to book yourself a spot for chilling session at blue sky 51. Beautiful place with great view. Aside from that this hotel located in the city centre which nearby to major shopping malls. Can’t wait for my next staycation in EQ again. Or just visiting to have a wonderful chilling at sky51.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I had a wonderful stay here...staff are friendly and helpful. Location is ideal for all shopping you want to do....centrally located. Lavish spread of different cuisines. Amenities were great.. Loved the jacuzzi experience,sauna, aromatherapy steam, jungle showers. The floor 51 gives you a breath taking view of the city. Ideal for photos 🤩

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: The hotel is centrally located with rooms tastefully designed with all amenities to make for a comfortable stay. The pool jacuzzi is spectacular with an impressive view of the skyline. We were spoiled for choice @ breakfast buffet. The best were the staff who were courteous and helpful making our stay outstanding, special mention of chef Ali. EQ - a memorable experience of hospitality!

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Loved the service from all the different departments of EQ Hotel, everyone greets you, asks after you regardless if they are from the front office, housekeeping, concierge, bell, engineering and fnb. Really cool facilities with excellent view especially the pool. Comes with aromatherapy steam room and himalayan salt sauna too. The tropical monsoon shower was cool as well! Had a great 6 days stay here and will be back again. Thank you all staff members for making the stay awesome.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Comfortable place to stay in the city centre. Accessible to the prestigious malls around KL city via walking, driving, public transport or e-hailing. The breakfast provided was very good with the mixture of local cuisines and western as well. The service was above average. I’ve been coming to this hotel for multiple times but the service never dissappoint me. 👍👍👍

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: The whole Stay was awesome as the staff was friendly and helpful.The room was superb. My kids really enjoy the room and the pool. Great Hospitality. Special Thanks to Mdm. Radhika (Reservation Manager) For your personal Assist.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Many happy memories of the old Equatorial as a child. Even better memories with my first stay at the New EQ. Great welcome and recognition with my Elite status All staff from the front desk to the pool side and club floor and restaurant were extremely friendly and kind. Full of charm. Special shoutout to Aslina the front desk manager for her special welcome and private contact for any issues, which of course there were none! Looking forward to our repeat visit next week

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Firstly would like to thanks Aslina staff from EQ! I. Lucky to have her to serving me and look around the beautiful EQ! I’m so happy and no regretful staying at EQ hotel! I would like to stay again and again, since my toddler is so happy with their room, breakfast and especially their pool …. I like the views and the ambient the environment, interior design of the building …anyway mostly all I love it! Can’t wait for my 2nd staycations with my family again 🤩 oh ya their foods is so yummy ! Their breakfast and buffet dinner … must try! Thank you EQ that not makes me disappointed and regret ❤️

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Stayed here 3 times in this month itself - being a frequent traveler I would always say & pick India for having the best hospitality & customer service, however Aslina & Irwan & the whole team has proved me wrong with their interpersonal skills, excellent communication & professionalism that made me visit EQ over & over again. Sometimes it’s not just about the place but the people that matters to make you feel comfortable during your stay - and that’s the most important, well to me. Keep up the great spirit, I’m sure Mr Donald & Mr Rick will be proud 👏🏻

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: We had a super stay over the Vesak day holidays after a long drive from Singapore. From check in to check out, everything went smoothly and service was excellent. 1. Room was large, very clean and well appointed. Excellent views and the complimentary mini bar was also much appreciated. Had a very good sleep both nights zzzz. 2. Breakfast is probably the best I ever had in a hotel. A mix of western and local dishes; the variety was huge. The nasi lemak and porridge were delicious. And the staff were there to top up coffee and clear the used dishes. Very efficient and courteous service. Kudos to the chef, kitchen and waiting staff! 3. Parking space is bright and secure. Further peace of mind as there are security guards around. And parking is complimentary. 4. Gorgeous pool …

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Room : weĺl taken care off, very happy about this Food : great tasting stuff! Would drop by again just for it. Compliments to the kitchen staff! Customer Service : awesome, kudos to the manager Check in/check out : efficient ans fast.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I was greeted like a vip & my room was beautifully decorated & impeccable. Food was sumptuous. I would recommend EQ to my family & friends. Tq to Justin Lee n his staff for their excellent service *****. .

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: This has to be the best weekend getaway in KL City, and most probably the best beds you’ll sleep on. Always a pleasant experience every time, fantastic staff from front door to Main reception to restaurants, whether your staying at the hotel or going for a night out, do yourself a favour and try Etoile Bistro on ground floor below reception (friendly staff will show the way) for the evening try Sky 51 and Blue at EQ We booked into the Sanctum Spa prior to booking out which topped off the weekend Can’t fault EQ and the effort they’ve put in to make this the number 1 hotel in KL

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Good Day!! Here is my review for EQ Kuala Lumpur.. for the third time staying at EQ felt like my second home.. spacious room, clean room and for the view I choose Twin Tower view. Nothing much to say, but friendly staff and here the name that I remember Miss Has from FnB, Mr. M. Faisal from concierge and Mr Irwan from Front Office . All the staff at EQ is the best!! Mostly thanks to Mr David Darshan that handle everything from my booking until my check-out date, very helpful person. To Miss Sharifah, thanks for helping me to investigate the issue that happened that day, nothing serious but fast action. Really2 appreciate it. EQ is my other home that will be in my heart. Keep It Up guys!!! Definitely will come again.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Super room with great views of KLCC and Menara KL. Service level from EQA staff were friendly, warm and meticulous. Turn down service was especially memorable! Loved the swan towel origami! Five star rating! Thank you for a memorable anniversary celebration in the EQ! Will definitely return again.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Simply Loved it! The entire customer experience was really good. From check-in, ushering to the room, with proper explanation of room amenities. Staff was friendly, helpful. From the gym, swimming pool to restaurants. You will really feel taken care of. Truly appreciate Anna and team for a memorable stay. Would surely come back again!

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: My 3rd stay at EQ was on 23rd April 2022. The service was surreal as always, the staff were warm, friendly and always willing to help. Some glitches i had on a previous stay were fixed thanks to my email feedback and such is a mark of a great hotel- looking into guests feedback and fixing them. Special mention needs to me made of Ms Aslina (Front Office Manager) who identified me from check in, offered assistance throughout my stay and ensured my change of room went smoothly. Ms Asni and Ain at the front office are also very pleasant front desk staff who make each of my stays memorable. I had requested to switch rooms to one facing the Twin Towers (my preference) and such was obliged within an hour. The room as with previous stays is always very clean, modern and well…

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Good location. Very friendly service by Ms Roshini & Ms Monica. Excellent stay. 😇 Would recommend this for anyone who wants comfortable stay. Best luxury hotel in town, very clean and tidy, the staff very attentive. For sure will come back again

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: This is my first ever review! I don’t usually give review but I can’t resist myself to say some good things about EQ. Me and my friend always hang out at the Etoille cafe on the ground floor which serve great food btw, wondering how does the hotel like. Booked 1 night for a staycation at “Premier King Room”. From customer service at the reception, Mr Irwan who was very friendly and attentive (it’s like meeting a friend) to room experience, totally amazeballs! Breakfast spread was great so does the amenities. Definitely will come again for staycation.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: It is the best hotel I ever stay! Good environment, Friendly stuff,Good food and great location, I was stayed at premire king suite it is great view! I make my stay at EQ again when I have a trip to KL again! Thank you so much

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: The hospitality was excellent,comfortable,staff was friendly including the security,strategic location near the pavilion and klcc..and big thank to Mr David(sale department) for his warmth hospitality during our visit,stay 3day 2 night at eq kuala lumpur was great

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Nice room with stunning twin towers view, clean and comfy, good service. Stayed on 31 dec, had to wait for check in around 1.5h in the lounge provided, free drinks and snacks. Walking distance to pavilion kuala lumpur. Coffee machine and free capsule provided in the room.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Superb facilities and warm hospitality. I enjoyed my stay in EQ and had a memorable moments throughout the stay. It's a great place for gathering with family and friends. I had a wonderful experience at EQ. Every staff member I encountered,from the valet to the check-in to the cleaning staff were delightful and eager to help. This is the perfect hotel for a weekend getaway. The best hotel I've ever been privileged enough to stay at. Gorgeous building,and it only gets more breathtaking when you walk in. High Quality Rooms and High Quality Service.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Stayed in Premier King KL Tower View in April 2022. FABULOUS & CLEAN ROOM with best bath tub view! I must say over the 5-stars hotels we stayed in KL for our staycation this year, EQ has topped the league and made our stay so much better! Wrote them an email for our request in the wee hours of the morning (even we have yet to book the room) and the Reservation Manager, Ms Radhika contacted me within the very next business hour (impressive and professional!). Without a doubt, I booked the room immediately after knowing that we would be well taken care of by the team. If you have spoken to them, you would know how warm and friendly it is! This is true Malaysian Hospitality! Even tho it was just a night stay for our celebration, we were still very impressed with what we have…

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Superb value for a 5 star luxury hotel. Location is central, convenient to KLCC and Pavilion, all within walking distance. Breakfast spread with Raya goodies & feel is a bonus, thanks to all Muslim staff who sacrificed Raya to serve us, we are immensely grateful. The room for 4 is generously spacious, clean and very comfortable, mini bar is free. Used all fitness amenities which i normally do not, what stands out is the beautifully designed fully equipped gym, the himalayan sea salt sauna, steam bath, the highlight is the Monsoon shower!. The outdoor jacuzzi with the water jet which massages the body is so relaxing whilst gazing at the KL Tower, the view is beautiful. Unmatched view of KLCC and KL Tower from the Skybar and Sabayon on the 51st floor, most instagramable spot.…

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Thanks to EQ Staff Mr Darshan, David for helping to arrange and customise a proposal plan according to budget and requirement. The plan consist of 1 night stay (room with KLCC view), dinner at Sabayon fine dining, proposal at Blue upper deck at sunset, flower bouquet and room decoration. Everything went well except there were no flower petals as promised at Blue upper deck, slightly disappointing. Service at Sabayon was exceptional, we received a hand written card with our picture and complimentary champagne from the restaurant. Thankful and well done to Sabayon team for the effort. Other notable points; car park is spacious and brightly lit as compared to other KL buildings. Wonderful surprise to receive welcome drink while waiting to check in at Lobby.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Excellent staycation experience as always Warm service from the staff, Good customer service very professional Excellent location,Nice view from our room Best hotel room, interiors are awesome Fantastic amenities,Keep up the good work!

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I can say a lot about this beautiful hotel with a great location close to the twins in the city center of KL and the very good quality of the hotel with appearance, the kitchen and the rooms. But what touched me most were the people. Faizal and his colleagues were to me personally, my loveones and business contacts more than employees of the hotel. What a excellent and warm service and I have never left a hotel with a lump in my throat! Dear staff and especially Faizal, ONE BIG APLAUS AND KEEP ON GOINIG! Mister Maikel, See you soon again....

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Our gathering was held in EQ. Excellent hotel in the center of KL. We explored the top floor 51st floor bar. Excellent view. The buffet dinner was fantastic with good choices of food, both Asian and Western dishes. We booked two rooms, a very nice and comfortable bed, spacious, good mattress and good view too. Room service is excellent too. The staff was very friendly, well trained and we enjoyed ourselves during our stay. Definitely EQ was an excellent choice.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: For a single female traveller, EQ is an amazing hotel to use. Safe, modern, chic, and full of amazing staff who would look after all your whims and fancy. The room is spacious, comfortable and a delight to use, especially the bed and the bath. (note... not all rooms have a bathtub. Be sure to ask Reception). The food and beverage offerings in this hotel is second to none. Citarasa Nipah, the ramadan buffet currently being offered is a gastronomic feast of authentic Malaysian cuisine, peppered with some western delights like the oyster bar. Etoile is simply divine with their selective but delicious menu. From Room Service, do not miss ordering the Hor Fun ... it was so good that I had it as a takeout after checking out of the hotel. Dont take my word for it, experience it for…

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Staycation to celebrate birthday and the hotel had nicely decorate our room and provide mini cake. We feel welcoming and the sercives is excellent throughout our stay. We plan to back again in near future.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I love everything about this hotel. Exquisite. Will definitely come again. Worthy for the quality and services. Nice view at the outdoor swimming pool. Spacious room and nice bed. Fast check in services and the staff remembers what I requested. Very pleased.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Last staycation for my birthday vacay , had seamless check in from Mr Irwan , he is so humble and friendly he even upgraded our room to twin tower view and arranged fabulous room deco even though my sister requested at the very last minute .. that’s very thoughtful of him .. loved the hospitality from the entire front desk team actually , there is a welcome drink given to us during the check in process .. nice ambiance, friendly staffs .. shoutout to sarvin , noh , yazid and anis for their hospitality during our stay . Kudos front desk team 👏🏻 Breakfast can be improve not so tasty , seems like the staff from the F&B very busy for the iftar buffet , the staffs busy setting the table during the breakfast and makes the service very slow need to wait for them to clear the dirty…

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I love meeting and spending time with my school mates from Sitiawan, Perak Howver the planning used to leave me stressed out to enjoy my time with my friends. Someone suggested EQ I just reserved the room and all the arrangements were taken care off. Our surprise start with cocktails at the 51st floor followed by buffet dinner was simply fun and beyond expectations. The staff were friendly, made us feel at home. The pictures speak for themselves. Really a weekend to cherish. My friends kept thanking me. They didn't know that I was lucky to have chosen EQ Hotel.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I love staying in hotels and I always do researches before making a reservation. I booked EQ KL because it has remained top in Trip Advisor throughout the pandemic, hence I was really curious. I have never heard of EQ if not for Trip Advisor. We are a family of 5, my elderly mom, me & hubs and 2 kids (less than 12yo). So I booked 2 rooms (a deluxe queen with 2 queen beds and a deluxe king). We arrived late in the evening ~ 5:30pm, and was in a hurry for a dinner appt at 6:30pm. Unfortunately the check in was very disappointing. First, the lady could not find my deluxe queen room and asked if someone else has checked in. After a while of going through the computer with the help of a colleague, she got us the room but it was on a different floor (I did request for connecting/same…

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I approached EQ for room package for my marriage proposal package. They served me with patient and polite. The deals offered is reasonable and basically all inclusive. They assigned a dedicated staff to follow-up with me on the arrangement and keep me updated on the progress. I will recommend EQ for your special occasion or celebrations.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: The title says it all. My wife & I have the best staycation experience in our life so far. The hotel staffs are friendly & helpful. The room is great & the best! Dining & food is delicious & variety. Cleanliness 10/10. Parking accessible & easy. Definitely will return with our children next time.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I love EQ Kuala Lumpur. Modern and stylish concept interior/new building. Room super clean, staff very friendly and helpfull. Breathtaking view and great Sky51 ~ one of the most beautiful and fascinating panoramic views of Kuala Lumpur.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: From the moment my driver arrived at EQ, everything was fantastic. Check in was smooth, the hall way was very elegant, staff are friendly and approachable. Went to Blue Bar for a sunset drinks, staff are great. Love the chilled bubbly they served (have to mention, not all bars could serve their bubbly this chilled temperature in Malaysia and I like my bubbly chilled) Gym was fantastic with all equipment I need. Pool was perfect with the view, the design and the amount of sun i can get there. I was late for my check out time due to a meeting and was being extended another 2 hours for it.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I have just found my perfect rooftop bar. Blue @ EQ offers an amazing panoramic view of Kuala Lumpur. Their light bites were delectable and most importantly we were treated so well by their accommodating staffs. Every outing there had been worth remembering. Will be back.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: What sets this hotel apart as compared to other hotels in Kuala Lumpur are their staff, whom are very attentive and are always ensuring that any queries you may have on the hotel facilities, etc. The hotel room and facilities are top-notch. Breakfast selection was excellent at the Nipah coffee house. Had dinner at their bistro, and the food and drinks selection were excellent too.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: One word sum it all, phenomenal! The high standard set by EQ really blew us away. The standard of service is absolutely excellent! For the moment we arrived we are politely greeted and we can see five to six person there ready to help you with your luggage or anything at all. Check-in was a breeze and a quick explanation was given about the hotel and it's facilities. One person looking at the computer keying in the details, another person talking to me while the third person gets cold drinks and cold towels for us. What kind of brilliant standard is this? Simply amazing at the check-in counter! After that, the hotel will have a lady handling the lifts and helping you with the floors button which was great! Our room was super spacious and super clean, really appreciate the…

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: First and foremost, I was quite delighted to stay in the first hotel listed on Tripadvisor. Many interesting stories have been given by friends, and I took advantage of the opportunity to book a room at this hotel. Check in as soon as possible. I was greeted with a welcome drink and a warm towel. Mr. Arvind, the front desk manager, brought me to my room and talked a little bit about the hotel, which I will never forget. Mr Arvind and his team deserve congratulations. The Premier King Infinity Room in Kuala Lumpur is a very appealing room because it has views of the KLCC and the KL Tower. The corner room on the 45th floor offers a unique and spectacular view. If you have the opportunity, reserve this room. I had intended to celebrate my son's fourth birthday during this…

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews but shoutout to Faizal at the driveway for being helpful while I had some things to settle at EQ really quick. He was proactive in approaching and offering assistance for even the smallest matters. 😁😁

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Stayed in EQ for 3 weeks in Jan 2022. Clean, stylish and new rooms, with great cleaning service (thanks Aminrul and Rasif!) Very friendly bellboys (thanks Mr Faisal) to greet you from the cars, and friendly staff at Nipah (thanks Azuman and Aidil!) and Kampachi too. Room service arrived promptly (for food and laundry) and additional services like printing were carried out rapidly too. Will definitely stay again!

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Room is very modern and clean. Very comfortable bed and pillow. Nice view of kl city. We stayed in double deluxe room which is perfect size for family of 4 like us. We especially like the separated toilet and shower, which is convenient for a bigger family like us. We just wished that there is better facility for muslims to take wudhu for prayers. My teenage kids has concerns that there is no lock in the shower area (i call it trust issues 🤣) Breakfast spread is awesome. Nasi lemak, roti canai, noodles, porridge, bread and pastries, american breakfast, salad, fruits, and many more. You will be spoilt for choice. Hope to come back again soon! 😍

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: A must stay hotel to stay in Kuala Lumpur. Everything about my family staycation was so perfect. Extremely happy and satisfied with their service, food and the room. From the room can see twin tower view. Highly recommended and will definitely repeat.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: The newly revamped EQ Kuala Lumpur is breathtaking. The roof top bar, Blue, is a great place to catch some of KL's best live music acts. The venue is intimate and cosy. On top of that you get to see one of the best panoramic view of the city.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: We were looking forward to dine at EQ Hotel again. This time, we experienced their delectable Chinese cuisine at its Golden Phoenix Pop Up Restaurant (available till 20th Feb 2022!). They live up to their reputation : sumptuous and delicious food with impeccable service! We hear that their Chinese fare can be arranged for group occasions at other times. The EQ team is friendly, hospitable and accommodating. You will leave with a smile!

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: How many hotels in KL would have invested to provide a revamped hospitality? Only EQKL does. A 3D2N stay in Premiere Room with magnificent skyline view (of course KLCC and KL Tower to spill the beans), it was a truly memorable & comfortable stay. Complete amenities provided (with the shaving cream & wooden hair comb) and wide range of complimentary drinks on the bar. Need I say more, my fiancée and I have stamped EQKL as our place to stay whenever we barge into the capital

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: It's really comfortable, Friendly counter staff, A peaceful night in the city center, a peaceful night at the 51 floor have a bar is good for enjoy girl drink and talk hold night in my few visit im Very satisfied if come by trip or Business is prefer also

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Booked a 3D2N stay for CNY at EQ. My 3rd visit since the hotel was reopened. As usual, everything about the hotel was superb. Requested for early check-in and managed to check in at noon. Checking in was relatively fast as there was no queue at the front desk. Chose a Premier King Twin Towers view room and requested for a room on a high floor which the hotel graciously accommodated by assigning me a room on the 45th floor. The room was extremely spacious and beautifully decorated and the king sized bed was directly facing the Twin Towers. Hard to beat such a magnificent view! You could even see the KLCC park lake with its light show at night in the distance. All the staff here are extremely polite and helpful from the front desk to the restaurant staff and housekeeping. The…

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Location is good, hotel is located in the middle of city centre. We booked premier room with klcc view, although the bathtub area is not up to our expectations, but things was resolved quickly by their staffs. High response and excellent service. Nice place for couples😉

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Hotel has been recently refurbished. Checked in the Deluxe Queen Double room. Sleeps 4 comfortably. Room was spacious and clean. Comes with complimentary mini bar. The bedding and sheets were so luxe 😍. Staff was attentive and courteous. Check in and check out process was a breeze. Views from the pool and sky51 is not to be missed.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: My family and I had a wonderful and memorable stay at EQ hotel from 30 Dec 2021 to 1 Jan 2022 and we truly enjoyed the hotel, the facilities, the food, the location and the hospitality & services from the get-go. The hotel room is clean, the view outside the window is even stunning at night – simply breathtaking. The hotel staff are friendly, resourceful and very responsive to our needs even we put in the requests randomly or at the last minute. The Club Manager Anna was so attentive to details beyond my imagination and created a pleasant surprise for me on the eve of new year 😊. Jess, the Group Director of Marketing went the extra mile to make the impossible possible for our restaurant reservations on the new year eve which we find it extraordinary. Not to mention also…

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: We booked for a couples massage. It was a birthday treat. The experience was so relaxing. Lensi was so helpful organizing our appointment. Annette gave an informative induction to the facilities and Jenny ensured our pre and post experience was smooth and we were well taken care of. The staff ensured we had thoughtful personal care. The massage room was beautifully decorated with banners and signs. The hydro therapy jacuzzi in the main pool was such a rejuvinating experice. Highly recommend this space for a rest and relax!

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: They have beautiful sauna facilities . These are located seperately within the male and female bath area. It is a 3 step process which starts with a dry Himalayan salt sauna, the next room is a steam bath and the final process is a monsoon shower. The monsoon shower is a corridor with 3 showers. You activate it by pressing a button and letting the automatic lit showers guide you through. All this culmibates to a very calm detoxifying experience. Highly recomended

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: We booked for 4 pax and requested for 4 wine glasses and classes but we were given the answer that each room only allow to hv two . This is illogical as how do four people use two glasses and do you expect us to share ? We are here to do the survey for our company regional event, we are totally unsatisfied and shocked about the simple and basic ask and yet the famous EQ hotel cannot fulfill . Please treat this as constructive feedback fOr further improvement .

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Got in 21st dec and just & checked out 24th Dec. Quality stay with good service & friendly staff! From the 1st moment you step into my clean room.. know you will have a good stay! Easy access walking distance from Pavilion mall..painful for the wallet because its a shopping paradise!

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I booked 3rooms for 2nights at the hotel for my family gathering after almost a year we didn’t gather together. The rooms was great. Staff service was superb. Overall stays was fantastic and marvellous. 5stars for EQ Hotel.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: On Saturday 18th Dec our life went upside down. I was trapped in the massive flood in Shah Alam and having to abandon my car after being rescued by my husband and son, we began a harrowing journey to look for a safer place as we couldnt go home as all access to our house were flooded with water. We found ourselves in KL by midnight and managed to check in at EQ at past 1 am in the morning of SUnday. We were damn tired, looked haggard and eager to have a comfortable room to rest and clean ourselves ( we have been on the road for 10 hours at that time). The receptionist showed no sympathy nor concern about us but was more inclined to state that the room rate was RM 900 and its without breakfast ( normal was RM550) to us and appeared annoyed that I didnt inform her prior to…

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Having just checked out from a nearby 5 star hotel , I had a much lower expectation as EQ is consistently rated lower than the one I just checked out. However the check in service and the introduction to the rooms were superb. We were also offered a QR code to get cheaper rates for future bookings and sure enough we booked 2 rooms again exactly a month later. Watch out for its review after we checked out for a second time😄

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Amazing night out - special thanks to Siva from Blue @ EQ Hotel and his team Simon and Ijan for making a birthday party so memorable. The team was on-point in service and friendliness - making it an ease to spend time with friends while hosting.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I could go on and on about how amazing the facilities are at EQ. How their gym is better equipped than any hotel gym I've ever seen. How I spent way too much time in the infinity pool, sea salt sauna and eucalyptus steam room. I could write an essay on how much I enjoyed my room. How I loved the free nespresso pods, free minibar, view of KL from the bathtub, rainfall shower, comfortable bed, endless entertainment options or the automatic room darkening shades. I could probably use up the character limit writing about how much I enjoyed the food and beverage I had while at EQ. Whether it was an American breakfast in the morning, an afternoon Iced Teh Tarik, a late evening Roti Canai or a nightime Pizza, everything I had was delicious, and served in a timely fashion. But, I'd…

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I had a wonderful stay at the EQ. my room on the 50th floor had a wonderful view of the KLCC towers and the bed was extremely comfortable. I enjoyed the buffet breakfast and lunch and the service was nonpareil. Everything was just super!

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: My holiday at EQ KL cane after many months of staying at home due to Covid restrictions. The whole family was looking forward to a luxurious getaway and we were most impressed. Newly renovated, the rooms and facilities were top notch with never seen before fixtures. I am impressed with the planning and no expense spared refurbishment. The views were also impressive...KL tower, KLCC and the Merdeka 118 tower all just out the window. There were many dining choices and we enjoyed the Japanese restaurant Kampachi the most. I am so glad we chose this hotel and will definitely be coming back.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Friendly and helpful staff, and good food! I enjoyed the high tea and breakfast a lot. Staff were very attentive and polite. Also, it is very near KLCC, just a short walk away. A lot of other good places to eat around the hotel too

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: The room was very spacious, stylish and super comfortable. It has an amazing view of the KL Tower and the city! It is conveniently located within walking distance from KLCC and Pavilion shopping centre. Superb dining choices at the EQ together with its amazing gym and spa that one can just relax at the hotel the whole day. The staff took care of us very well and made us feel very much at home! Will definitely go back again.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: In the 1970s I remember as a very special treat , my piano teacher brought me to Equatorial for their high tea. I have very fond memories of it.. After its major refurbishment, I returned this time and this stay has left me with even fonder memories. Like any 5* hotel, the rooms, the dining and all the facilities are amazingly good. I loved the view of the city skyline from th 50th floor. This is the first time I have seen the hills surrounding KL at the background of the city because the view from so high stretched out so far. The infinity pool on the 29th floor is equally amazing. But most of all i found the staff to be very warm and welcoming and each of them gave their personal touch to make us feel special during our stay. Cheers to all the staff from the cleaner , the…

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: After 40 years of excellent Equatorial Hotel service, it was an amazing experience to stay at the new EQ Hotel . Brand new and only 2 years old, and 51 stories high the level of service and the rooms were also sky high. The view is over the top and the rooms on the corer gives guests a incredible view of the city and KLCC. The F and B is just as fantastic with a wide variety of choices. My only regret is I wish I could have stayed longer. Top notch , best hotel in KL.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: My family of five spent 2 nights at EQ and we're definitely coming back. The hotel is very clean, well maintained and ultra modern with so many special little touches that make them stand out. We were also impressed with the excellent service given by their friendly staff. Best of all was the location... only a short pleasant 5 minute walk from KLCC. My children enjoyed the swimming pool with the heated jacuzzi very much while I was busy shopping and my husband was at the gym. I highly recommend this hotel for all ages.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: We had an amazing experience with top notch service given at KL EQ. Starting from the reception Mr Fareez had such a pleasant & smiling appearance to greet us. Rathika RSVP Manager who took extra initiative to show us EQ rest and convenient store. Jeremy gave us a warmth at the sanctum pool, sop was strictly followed and guest only had an hour in the pool. Our evening at EQ Blue was mind blowing as Mr. Siva had good PR skills to run the place. Only cover charge has to be removed for in-house guest even on weekends. Overall our stay & exp is definitely excellent. Customer service is truly remarkable. We'll definitely back again Uma / Premala ppremyy@gmail.com

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Check in 15/12/2021 room 3616 Booking at they website... Might be some issue very slow .... But ones you checking in at the hotel front desk...They are very fast and professional. Doorman is very helpful.... every single person working in the hotel will ask : how may I helps you sir. The room have a lots of natural light shining in. Very well clean, maintain and modern. Swimming pool at 28/29 floor with nice view of KL Tower. # if the TV set could move left and right would be perfect

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Hectic schedule and didn't manage to stay in even though have been recommended by EQ staff itself for sometimes after their refurbishment. Only manage to had their afternoon tea and Level 29 Sanctum Spa for friend gathering & birthday pamper session. Regretful to take a chance to check in to have an overall hotel experience but the facilities is good. Staff is friendly and helpful when we approach.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Had a wonderful return staycation with my family at the best hotel in the heart of Kuala Lumpur City Centre again! Their service is always being professional and never disappointed you. Would like to take this opportunity to appreciate the greatest EQ FO team Inthiran who assist me on the room booking and attend my enquiry professionally, Anna and Roshini make my check-in process smoothly. As well not to forget the other Associates who being so helpful during my stays. Even though everyone are with their face mask cover up the face, but still we can feel the warmest Malaysian hospitality and the smile from every single EQ Association. If you are new to them, strongly recommend to have a staycation with them, and for returners, definitely worth to return again and again! :)

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: This isn’t my first time staying in EQ . I come back here every time me and my family need a break from a rapid life . There are so many “awesomeness” to experience in Eq which will provide you a blissful stay . The team EQ has ,simply awesome ! They cheer u up with their sincere smile and always ready to provide you the best! The food surely a sensation ! You must try it ! Words aren’t enough to say about it. Enough said!! Go and experience it for urself and it’s worth every penny!!!

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: We had an amazing honeymoon staycation ever !😍 I was so amaze with the room, the view, the deco, their friendly staff. Their service & the hospitality is top notch i tell ya ! Big thanks to the staff name Farah Syakilla from Housekeeping for helping and assist us, explain about the promo and the hotel info ☺️ Definitely we will come again next time !

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Had a wonderful one night staycation. Room was immaculately clean, amenities were spot on, food was great😀😀. Special thanks to Shireen for sharing promotion information and recommending this stay. Kumar and his team were kind to keep some items overnight and turned out great for the surprise i was planning. Thanks you to Roshini at reception and Sofea the guest ambassador for the smooth check in and check out. Exceptional people👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: The stay was fantastic! Employees are all very courteous and helpful. The food were top notch and very family friendly as well. In fact, after staying last week, I booked another night for next week. 10/10

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Planned a 1 day staycation for my wife's birthday. It was absolute splendid time. The receptionist was friendly and professional made us feel welcomed. I informed them of my wife's birthday prior to our arrival and they ensured the room had some special decoration on the bed and some complementary deserts. The room was clean and neat. The bathroom was also very clean. I had made some reservation at the hotel restaurant for dinner and request the concierge service to assist with the surprises I had planned and they accommodated all my request and ensured it was delivered accordingly. We had our breakfast in the Nipah restaurant. Food was good, however I would say their breakfast buffet variety was quiet limited. The restaurant staffs were friendly and pleasant. I was overall…

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I had a fantastic time at EQ from the onset of my arrival until my checkout. My stay was a special one as I also proposed to my fiancee. The infinity pool is amazing and the room setting was all fantastic. The sky bar and the viewing point gives you a good spot for you to enjoy drinks and photo taking. Special thanks to the team that helped me planned from my arrival, 1 hour time at the infinity pool, drinks at the sky bar following with dinner, and tactful arrangement for my proposal at the viewpoint and the follow up room setting in our room. The food we ordered through dine in kitchen was also very delicious. Special shout out to these individuals and to their respective teams; 1) Ms Radhika & team 2) Ms Hasmiza & team 3) Siva & team 4) Angie & team Thanks so much and keep…

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: it was a last minute plan, i emailed a lot of hotels asking for connecting rooms to accommodate 6 of us. Ms Radhika from reservation team, went an extra mile by calling me straight away, asking for the details as we planned to celebrate my son's birthday and our anniversary as well. checking in was smooth and personalized. we were ushered up to our rooms and we were surprised with the treats and deco in the rooms. we stayed in the premier king klcc view connecting to a deluxe king room, the view was stunning. had a take away for the kids at etoille and love the eco-friendly take away packaging. had a drink at Blue at 51st floor at night and the view was spectacular. breakfast at Nipah was good. the staff were friendly and accommodating. food was good especially the pastries…

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: The team at EQ were absolutely amazing! From the Reservations team PIC Ms Radhika, to the Checking In team, they were all so accommodating & attentive to all our request. The rooms were a luxurious treat and so was the F&B options. Not to mention the fully decked up gymnasium! It was truly a memorable weekend getaway and we will surely be back!

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Had a very much needed 2N break with the family, booked it during the 9.9 flash sale. The proactive friendly service is so heartfelt throughout the whole stay! Very consistently from every single staff at the hotel, kudos to all the staff and management. Love the new modern design and vibe, super clean and not to mention the complimentary daily snacks (plus the snow skin mooncakes). Food served at the restaurants is nice and reasonably priced. Kids love the infinity pool with beautiful city view, so close to the KL Tower. Best to swim during the evening for the sunset when the pool turns colorful. A memorable magical moment for us! The only minus is the double queen room is rather small. Overall, a very complete pampering experience and highly recommended!

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I had a wonderful stay at EQ Hotel. This would be my 2nd time here. The managers and the front desks are very welcoming. And the best part is they managed to get things done for my special request. Thank you to their reservation manager, Radhika who managed to take care of my special request in order. I totally love it! And thank you to the front office manager, Arvind who caught me checking in for the 2nd time too. It feels like coming back to your own nest. Obviously looking forward for my 3rd stay here.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: ONE OF THE BEST STAY IN EVERGO🌸 The scenary,infinity pool ,The food SUPERBB DELICIOUS! Our fav NASI GORENG KAMPUNG NIPAH😍staff very helpfull, big mention to The staff Nik noor farah and David They arrange all from before check in until check out! Will repeat again in future,Thanks!🌹

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Due to the pandemic, suggest the Nipah restaurant buffet breakfast can be send to the room with selective menu option although dine in is already available. Others than that, the room, staff, environment was great, highly recommended to stay in KL.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Well this is my first time having a holiday in KL as I'm from KL and mostly have had holidays all around Malaysia. To tell you'll the truth, EQ really blew my mind. The experience I had was equaling to a 7 star rating. First of all, Kudos for the service, very friendly, helpful and willing to listen staff. Always with a smile and always making you feel comfortable. I had birthday plans for my fiancé in the room and they did everything to make it a memorable one. I was upgraded to bigger and better room. The deco was amazing and even had chocolate complimentary from the Chef. Do I have to say more? Unfortunately I was not able to experience the hotel utilities and restaurants due to the pandemic. But for sure I will be back to your hotel once all this have been cleared to …

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: My fiancee and i had a great stay at EQ hotel over the weekend. The room was clean and comfortable, makes us feeling safe staying in the hotel. Special thanks to the team for making my proposal in the room smooth and successful. Will definitely come back again and introduce to my friend and family.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: We had an awesome stay. The ambs & dining team really helpful with the birthday decorations & special dinner setup in the room!! Though ot was MCO, we still had comfy stay & ordered in. Cozy hotel, friendly staff & good food.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Exceptionally clean and modern luxurious room, stayed in Premier King room accompanied by beautiful Kuala Lumpur cityscape; loved it especially during the night😍😍Very friendly and helpful service from the staffs. Undoubtedly pleasant stay and will definitely return one day.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Would like to rate as 5 star but due to some technical issue that have to deduct one star. Great pool and jacuzzi, comfort and well deco room, friendly and helpful staff, breakfast also not bad. The let down part is limitation of TV channel and cannot believe that with such 5 star hotel is not able to provide a normal HDMI cable to connect from my laptop.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: There's no better way to wind down from a busy day than at the top of the EQ. I had the most refreshing view of why KL is aka klang valley from the commanding front row view of the rolling hills surrounding the valley from the middle of the golden triangle. Absolutely charming.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Had an amazing stay in EQ KL food choices was amazing the room spacious and the service excellent will definitely stay again ideal for a staycation or just to escape from the hustle and bustle of the city

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I stayed in during the Pavilion of Paradise with my husband & 8 mth baby...is quite at the time with staff will recognise you after your check in, Thanks to Aslina, JP and Inti (sorry cant recall all the name). After check in, cant wait to bring my baby to pool but is drizzling so got to wait... and plan change to Pavilion.. Staff so kind to help arrange a BMW and while waiting inside lobby (since raining) staff will recognise you and asked if everything is great... Mr Sebastian share about the hotel history and we cant believe although we not a VIP, all the staff treat us like a more than a VIP.. After the short walk we back to hotel. Rain stop and surprisingly we received a call from wellness to inform rain stop and if we wanted swim pool is open. Thank to Aizat the staff…

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: The place was absolutely gorgeous and their service is excellent . Plus their sky bar is beautiful, a great place to celebrate any occasion, I would definitely come here again 10/10. Highly recommended!

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Brought my mom to EQ (5/4/2021) for a night stay as a birthday gift and we had an amazing stay, I dont even know where to begin! I requested for early check-in. The staff (Farisha) told us the room would be ready in 30 mins and they'd call once it's ready. So while waiting we went to Etoile for a quick lunch. They didn''t call us. Instead the staff (Irwan) went to Etoile to tell us in person! The room was spacious and well lit. Bonus points - automatic blackout blinds and coffee machine. I loved the whole interior, the way the circle logo was placed on the cupboard door, a separate “hidden” door to connect rooms, high ceiling, amenities, bathtub..almost everything. We had dinner at Kampachi. Staff was kind enough to accommodate us despite being fully booked. Etoile has good…

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: It's all started with telephone call for inquiry. Rizal amazed me with his attentive personal. He explained detail on my inquiry and so friendly. This was the best hotel hotline assisstance i've ever experienced. I immediately book EQ and tadaa we are here. I'm writing this while i'm waiting for slot for swimming pool. This is very good in handling crowd during this pandemic. Kudos Aizad. So, let me start from check in. Jean Pierre or he want us to call him JP. I'm speechless, he upgraded us to KLCC view room and even escorted us to the room. He explained detail on the room; how to use the switch, open the blind. I love everthing about the room, the bath tub, free minibar, coffee machine (gusto), complete toiletries . Then, i went to spa. Len with a big smile (i can see it…

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Went there for the birthday of my wife. The room we took (Premier with KLCC view) was amazing and comfortable. The service is also excellent and the staff is very friendly and helpful. Even if we had to wait about 25 min to check in, they did their best to apologize properly. Amazing facilities (gym and pool). I highly recommand the restaurant Sabayon. I recommand this hotel and will come back.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: EQ has recently renovated, the interior are classy and comfortable. We enjoy the KLCC and Kl tower view from our room! Room come with complimentary mini bar, good AC, automated blind and the best hot shower/bath tub! The staffs are really friendly and attentive, do check out the sky deck and sabayon restaurant in level 51. Love their aromatic steam and sauna too! Kids are pretty safe at the pool as the staffs always keeping an eye on them. while kids having fun adults can enjoy the jacuzzi next to the swimming pool.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: This was our 2nd stay at EQ hotel, and we got a free upgrade to Deluxe King Club room. The view from our room at 49th floor was awesome! The bed was super comfy, and the complimentary bath salt made me feel truly rested. Breakfast at Nipah was delicious as always, my favourite is still the pancake :) We also had buffet dinner at Nipah, which had a good selection of food and desserts. It was truly an indulging staycation for us.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: We stayed in the Premier King KL Tower View room to celebrate birthday and anniversary. The view from the room was beautiful. The complimentary red velvet cake was a sweet gesture from the hotel. Check-in process took some time. However, guests were given welcoming drink while waiting to be checked-in. We were led by the staff to our room, and luggage was sent to us afterwards. The air-conditioned room was spacious with modern interior decoration. We had a great view of KL Tower from the bathtub. What a way to relax ourselves. The food was delicious and we enjoyed our meals in Nipah. We enjoyed our afternoon tea in Bottega Lounge too. The atmosphere was lovely. Staffs were friendly as they greeted us whenever they saw us. They were helpful and courteous. Thumbs-up for their…

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: "WOW" This was my first time staying with family at Hotel equatorial.start from arrival check in until check out super!!!! Staff bellman valet front desk very friendly really really 5 star service..Especially Mr Ryan & Ms sofea very help full arranged my booking and i feel shock when i arrived to room some surprised on the bed "happy Anniversary" Breakfast at nipah food was good really enjoyed. We hope will come back & stay again at this hotel. <3 <3 <3 Thank you Zan

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: We arrived a bit early n check in time is 3pm so we decide to used the pool n sauna facility till our room ready.. En Irwan Duty Manager n all staff very friendly from day we arrived till we check out.. a bit late for room to ready but their appologize so many time is ok since we happy with our pool time .. Very impressed with the service from all of them..Well done, our stay unforgettable. Thank u all EQ staff Kuala Lumpur!!. We will come again🥰

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: We have arrived at the hotel at around 3:45pm and the purpose of our stay were just to unwind from the long lock down - stay at home. My kids and my husband decided to choose EQ because of our parents get used to stay at EQ before. But as we arrived, we saw long queues. A lots of people queuing for the registration. And when our turn to register the receptionist told us that our room was not ready and we have to wait. Honestly, speaking we were so discouraged at that time because we thought we can spend much time to unwind ourselves. My kids started to make their tantrums and me and my husband also started to get irritated. I think my husband went back to the counter for almost 3 times yet room still not ready. My husband decided to cancel the booking and spoken to one of the…

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: It was a wonderful get away at EQ and i had so much fun. The view was spectacular too😍 hope to come here again in the future. Thank you for the hospitality given by all the hotel staffs, they were very friendly and helpful.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Wedding during RMCO.. preparations at EQ Hotel such a lovely memories for my Big Day. Thanks to All front office staff (Petrina,Afiq and Indi) for all arrangements... will never forget and definitely will come back for Anniversary.. Thanks again EQ Hotel

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: After series of movement control orders due to Covid19, I decided to have weekend staycation just in KL. We choose EQ Kuala Lumpur because of the room size and 2 queen bed in 1 room to accommodate all my kids. The Hospitality was superb with hotel staff attending all the necessities. The breakfast provided with many varieties food selections. The hotel cafe have ample spaces with ambience surroundings. Locations nearby klcc within 10 minutes drive. Nice view from swimming pool area located at high level.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Service was great eventhough there were a few hiccups but the EQ team managed it well. The view of the twin towers from our room was amazing at night! Buffet breakfast was nice but the three course dinner served in our room was even better! Very pleasant experience and wish we could stay longer next time round!

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: We celebrated our first anniversary as a married couple with a short staycation at EQ Kuala Lumpur. We haven't managed to go anywhere for vacation, honeymoon or do any relaxation until now, no thanks to the crazy 2020 pandemic period. Special thanks to the great and attentive staffs of EQ Kuala Lumpur for the room with the amazing view of the gorgeous KLCC, the room decor, congratulation wish card and complimentary desserts for our private in-room celebration. We also went to EQ's rooftop restaurant, Sabayon for our delectable fine-dining experience coupled with the best views of Kuala Lumpur's nightscape. The food was absolutely delicious and made even better when Angie (the manager) who brought out our dessert with a congratulatory note (with candles) and champagne. And the…

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: The hotel staff is friendly and helpful during my stay. The room is clean and spacious with a great city view. I also request the hotel to have some decoration to celebrate my daughter’s birthday. The hotel had specially prepared a nice and delicious red velvet cake in the room before we check-in. We had a Great experience staying at EQ Hotel Kuala Lumpur.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: After almost a year movement control order, we decided to travel after the cases dropped some numbers. We visit to Zoo Negara to support our local tourism and check in to EQ hotel by the Stay and Indulge package. Surprisingly, I didn’t know there’s a gem in KL have such a new Sara modern 5 star hotel. Warm welcome by the front desk also direct you to your designated floor. The package include dine in room and breakfast also late check out 4pm which my family can enjoy the pool without a rush in next morning. Nevertheless, the breakfast can be improve on the variety of choice. Keep it up. Hope to experience the business hotel in future

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Our stay at EQ Kuala Lumpur was a very pleasant stay, all the staffs was very nice to us, the atmosphere in the hotel is very elegant and cozy, the food was amazing, the view is breathtaking! I booked the “Stay In & Indulge” promo and requested in the website to upgrade my room to the KLCC view and agree with the additional charges but they upgraded my room for free! I also enjoy late check-out (4:00pm) for free as well!

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Definetly will be back again! We love everyone that we met and everything that we experience here in EQ KL. We feel so warmed and welcomed. Thumbs up for early check in and late checkout, fast respond to our problem, cool complimentary. A must hotel to stay in KL! I need extra EQ chocolate next time ( love it so much)

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Had a wonderful stay EQ Kuala Lumpur from 13-14 Mar 2021. Eventhough a short staycation, all the staff really appreciate their guest. Friendly greeting by the staff to the guest from the moment we walk into the lobby till we left. The staff was very helpful. Especially during check in and check out time. The staff at the pool and spa area was very well train and helpful. Had a wonderful short staycation. Will definitely return for another great stay. Thank you guys.. keep up the wonderful work 💪🏽👍🏽

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Beautifully luxurious but not at a premium price. Everything about this hotel is quality, from the welcome arrival to the perfectly appointed rooms. Comfortable, cozy and uniquely EQ throughout. Our corner premium room had views of the Twin Towers, city skyline and the KL Tower. Sunrise in the morning through to sunset in the evening. Sky51 and Blue bar could be the best sky bar location in KL! Everything about our stay was perfect. Couldn’t fault it, even at a time when other hotels are struggling to balance the lower demand with the right level of manpower/service. Will be staying again for sure!

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Great place and hospitality from EQ Amazing experience & superb scenery from the deck! Various of F&B choices for personal preferred. Strategic location in the city centre which surrounded by major shopping malls.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: We actually booked the hotel stay with kampachi dinner package at the last minute just the day before checkin on 5 Mar for stay on 6 to 7 Mar. We called to enquire the hotel and received very good assistance in confirming room availability and if we could arrange the dinner on 7 Mar instead due to actual birthday date is 7th. Although there were several back and forth, Kampachi confirmed we could do on 7th and hotel also arranged to confirm our booking immediately. Many thanks to Mr Ritchie -duty manager whom was very patient with our queries and help arrange this. Checkin process was smooth and we even have a room upgrade to KLCC view. There were cakes and deco in the room as well. We were able to have later checkout (first ever in my life i got a late checkout at that timing)…

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Took them up on their Japanese restaurant promo and we didn't regret it. Great rooms, good food, super friendly and helpful staff, fabulous building and views, good location. A perfect stay. Just wish we could have stayed longer. We will next time. If I had to look for an area of improvement perhaps the spread could have been bigger at breakfast. Still, world class hotel imo.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I dont want to say much but i can bet you will be satisfied with everything about this hotel. How friendly and professional staff!. How nice about their food and service. And how beautifulll about the room!!. And what i love the most is their scenery when sunset!. It’s unforgettable and worth every pennyyyy!!!. I really want to repeat it😭😍 because it was sooo beautiful!. You would regret it!. I hope i can visit here next time and had a chance to eat at sabayon🧡. Thank you eq hotel

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Its my first time here in this hotel. From the beginning when enter to the parking and then to the reception, i feel so warmed and welcomed with a great smile also a very friendly and helpful duty manager of the day - Mr. Ritchie (even though all of us wearing a mask!) I also been assisted gently by Mr. Affizam and Miss Ferisha guide me to my room. It was really amazing experience with a safety and security hotel that will ensure my privacy and comfortability during my time at the hotel.For the food, it satisfier me so much - cant complaint at all even im too fussy in hotel food! For the room...ya here its goes, with the superb view of KLCC and KL Tower also room at level 45, the view really amazed me and keep me enjoy the breathtaking view from my window. Room deco and the…

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Feel so warmed and delighted with the customer services throughout my stay. My room was upgraded to a premier suite for the same price, really an amazing experience in every way. Truly enjoy of staying high floor enjoying the KL city view, especially the position of the bed which is exactly facing the front window where you could truly enjoy the breathtaking KL city view when you wake up in the morning. Aside of it is the room layout where the shower room and powder room are separated, not even to mention the bath tub with superb skyline view. Felt so surprised with the special flower arrangement & bouquets prepared by EQ as they knew it was a stay to celebrate my birthday with my partner. Most like the 4-course fine dinner at Sabayon, was worthwhile a Michelin star at least.…

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: The Equatorial is one of the older names in the Kuala Lumpur (KL) hospitality industry. The original hotel opened in 1973 and was one of the mainstays on Jalan Sultan Ismail, one of the main thoroughfares of KL. So it was quite sad to hear of the hotel closing down for redevelopment back in 2012. But perhaps the fears were misplaced, as although the new redevelopment tore down the old structure and rebuilt an entirely new mixed development called the Equatorial Plaza, the hotel was still a key part of the Equatorial Plaza. Fast forward to 2019, and the new hotel, now called the EQ, was reopened for business, in the Plaza. Consisting of 440 keys in a 52-storey tower, the hotel’s location in the centre of KL’s Golden Triangle, makes it convenient for getting around. It’s just a…

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: It was a pleasant and memorable staycation on his big 3-0! Delightful touches of a handmade red valvet cake, basketful of fresh local fruits, greeting card and some red rose petals scattered on table. It’s the little touches and details that go into making it a great staycation option. Undeniable, the team are really helpful although we had some miscommunication while check-in but they are able to solve it within 15 mins. Personalized service from the moment we booked and they had extended our check-out time until 4pm to enjoy more of the panoramic city views and instagrammable spots! We are unable to check out their Infinity Pool at level 29 during these period of time, but it's definitely worth checking out while you're doing a staycation here. If you're looking for a…

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I was stay for business trip and the only hotel doesn't care about people safety. Due to MCO only take away available and the rest of my stay was ordered from outsourced delivery, I ask delivery guy to meet at lobby but no delivery bike to park and management ask to park their bike or car at the main road which is not safety for them or other car, twice the delivery boy almost get hit by other car because the hotel doesn't allowed them to park inside or nor motorbike to park especially for delivery rider. What kind of the management who work in EQ like no brain doesn't think about people safety??? Definitely I will report this to authorities to take action agains EQ. Please improve otherwise I will make report. I will be back next month and see if you guys have brain or not.…

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: No where near perfect. Upset with their presentation of the buffet. Please train your staff to be helpful to the guest. I was devastated with waiting time to be check in. I was waiting for almost 2 hour for get into my room.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: My 1st stay after MCO 2020 in March. This time taking the 1 day off , celebrating our 24th Anniversary with my loved one. Stayed for 1 night at EQ Hotel KL, and it was arranged by the team tremendously. They had the room decorated, with swan love and petals of roses on bed, fruit basket with a slice of cake. The room was spacious and the Reservation staff assisted us to the room and explained further on the features of the room. The mini bar was Complimentary ! Due to MCO, our package inclusive of breakfast at Nipah Restaurant and dinner in the room. The food served during our dinner, was delicious, The breakfast spread was nice, even though due to MCO, all are based on SOP. We also manage to have our tea at L2 Restaurant , which we had 1 club sandwich and chicken burger.…

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Celebrated my Fiancée’s birthday and Valentine’s weekend at EQ. It was pure bliss from the booking process to the planning with Ms Radhika (EQ reservation staff). She went above and beyond in making sure my wish to make my Fiancée’s birthday celebration and Valentine’s Day to be wonderful a reality. We were wowed from the moment we checked into our room until checkout. There was champagne, balloons and flowers, cake, and fruits with complimentary beverages in the mini bar. All of the hotel staff were also amazing and rendered excellent service. The food we had at all the restaurants and in-room dining was also delicious and very tasty. Will definitely be going back and highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a nice staycation in KL during this lockdown(MCO/CMCO/RMCO).

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Very beautiful hotel. Furnished well and the view from the room was just amazing 👏🏼. Good facilities as well. Duty manager Irwan Yusof was very helpful and made our stay nice and comfortable. Definitely gonna come back again

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: superb and chic building, the only Equatorial. got upgraded to twin towers view, impressed by the service and very welcoming faces. love the extra pillow in the closet! bed is perfectly firm, just how i like it. found a little mistake in room when checking in late evening, the management fixed it promptly without delaying. had breakfast and dinner at Nipah, setting of the restaurant is wonderful and comfortable and food quality is top notch.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Recommended hotel in KL area, there are good service , nice view , clean place , comfortable environment , room equipment is also very complete and the food also nice, I will go back again and recommend to friends too.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: The service at this hotel is excellent. They really go all out to ensure that you have a great stay. I’d like to give a special shout-out to Mr Azwan and Ms Shafiqah for providing us with excellent service. Everything done here is very personal. Excellent pool & spa too! Will come back.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Excellent stay although the pandemic kept the hotel vacant. Staff provided excellent service. Special thanks to Suzana from reservation dept that make our stay smooth and wonderful. Room amenities were adequate and the location was perfect, nice twin towers view. A part from that the bed is super comfy, in room entertainment is brilliant and the foods are marvellous. Thank you to Ijan from Sabayon for the nice picture. Totally Excuisite Experience with EQ KL.

address: Equatorial Plaza Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia
name: EQ Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: This hotel really exceed my expectations. My stay there was lovely, everyone there is so friendly and helpful, even the managers. They even allowed us to change rooms to get a better view. The room was very clean too. I have stayed in a lot of high end hotels in KL city centre, this is by far the best. Thank you EQ for the much enjoyable and unforgettable stay.

address: 132 West 47TH Street, New York City, NY 10036
name: Sanctuary Hotel New York
