name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: This review is made on behalf of Mr Tan Teoh Khoon: Since the re-opening of borders in Malaysia, I noted the huge turnover of staff, like in most industries. However, I noticed a few loyal and “older” staff who stayed on at the hotel provided great connection to regular guests, like myself. They are good role models at the front desk like: 1. Mdm Hezren who is patient to teach younger staff and provided super efficiency in stay-in processing. 2. Encik Narizuhal at the front desk is also friendly and warm. 3. Chief security Ronald is superb at recognizing regular guest from a distance and I wonder if he had done his cataract. Always welcoming and often, I see Chief Ronald step in to help out with the front desk due to shortage of staff, something that he may be doing…

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I have been coming here for the past 10 years The service continues to improve and I would compare it to a 7 star rating. The people are fantastic and the service particularly in the executive lounge is outstanding. Full honours to the management. I will continue to come back. Thankyou

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Breakfast and dinner buffet was excellent. The seafoods at dinner buffet was super fresh. Just a suggestion that for the dinner buffet there can be a more varied selection of food. The staffs are friendly and helpful especially Ms Aida from the Vasco’s reception front desk staff. I will be back for dinner buffet again ! :)

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Excellent service at executive lounge and Vasco. The seafood buffet dinner 🍽️ is very full of choices and replenish rapidly. Special thanks to few warm staff (Pravin, Baidah, Fauzi, Harini, Sanjai) who always provide assistance to us. They are so kind. Will revisit in future.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Awesome and fantastic including customer service Name: Sanjay, Pravin, baidah, Fauzi, Hariny. Food also delicious. Thanks a lot of the birthday arrangement too. Great service. Highly recommended. Thanks guys 😊

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: High tea is ok, 5 stars for Adli and Hanis services. It compliments our high tea session in the hotel. Adli is highly accommodating, previously met him in the Chamber Grills glad to know that he is promoted to take care more areas. Very friendly

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Great buffet dinner served. Lots of varieties to choose from whether it’s Western, Chinese, Malay or Indian you name it. The dessert selections are full of surprises too. Excellent hospitality from the staff: Sanjai, Baidah, Favzi, Hariny & Pravin.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Nice food, very nice service as well. The ribs are good, seafood here is very fresh. There is plenty of dessert variety. Very recommended, the staff here is friendly. Sanjai Baidah Fauzi Hariny Pravin

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Staff were friendly - - thanks for Fauzi, Harini Baidah, and Manager Sanjai. The food was well present and decision, specially the beef strips, cooked by Chef Rashdan. The Vasco Restaurant is good atmosphare for friends gathering.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Very friendly staff and helpful. Buffet Breakfast at Vasco was nice.Have full spa facilities and complete gym equipment.Room was good.Good location.Can just used klia express train from airport directly to Kuala Lumpur train station (KL Sentral)I will stay at this hotel in my next visit

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Stay with this hotel was very comfortable and the service level from the reception to the waiters at Vasco's are amazing! Especially Mr FAUZI (the person was always offers, asking and checked my additional coffee and breakfast satisfaction), ADAM JOHN, ELLAN, WARAN, ADANI and BAIDAH also friendly, everyone make my experience became WOW! We hade great stay here!! Thanks to all Vasco team!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Apart from the amazing selection of food for breakfast, the staff were really attentive and friendly. Special thanks Fauzi. Variety of food can be improve, taste of food and environment is good. Will do visit in future.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I had a wonderful stay. Breakfast was amazing! The staff are all so nice and hospitable. Special shout out to Fauzi. He was so accommodating and friendly. Also Adani. The room is great with a beautiful view. ❤️

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Dined at the japanese restaurant Iketeru on weekend, Fantastic atmosphere, very friendly staffs. Ms Aura and Ms Aishah have been very helpful during the entire dining experience. Nice food, relaxing environment and happy diners i can see in this place. Strongly recommend for couples and family to come and have good moment here.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: My family really enjoyed the food and ambience. Million thanks to azmi kuna sanjay who were assisting us from the day one we plan the event. Thanks to ms aidah who was helpful on the event day as well. Definitely i will repeat my visit

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Thank you to the below people for coordinating my dinner reservation. 1. Mohd Azmi - F&B Team Leader 2. Sanjay - Assistant Manager Enjoy the buffet spread, wide selection of cuisine. Also, pleasant ambient!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: This morning breakfast was great, Fauzi noticed the nesscafe tarik was not up to taste and changed immediately with clear explanation, appreciate his observation. Good team leader. Dayana was kind and nice, she attended out family members since day one we dine in for breakfast.service with smile, we.are here for five days.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Very nice food and huge variety of food available. Very friendly staffs.. Very nice ambience and nice dinner place for family gatherings..Thank you Jai, Baidah, Adam and Hariny for your great service! Definitely will visit again!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: This hotel is right across the street from Central, which means that you can take easily take the airport train in from KIA. Rooms are large and modern, the breakfast buffet is fantastic and the pool is amazing. No complaints.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Hostess to dinner at Chinese restaurant at Hilton hotel Kuala Lumpur by business partner. Initially I was rather sceptical about the food as my experience with hotel restaurant food has been quite disappointing. However my perception changed totally after the dinner at Hilton hotel. I was absolutely delighted from the first dish ( salad) to the desert. Chef Lum has done a fantastic job with his culinary skills. I was equally impressed with the service staff Edward for his impressive service delivery and wine knowledge and skills. Definitely will return visit to savour Chef Lum’s culinary skills and food for my next visit to Kuala Lumpur.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I had a wonderful birthday celebration with my family and friends at Hilton Hotel KL Sentral (Restaurant Vasco). I would like to express my heartfull gratitude to the following staff for their assistance and advice that made my birthday a memorable celebration. 1) Mohd Azmi - F&B Sales Team Leader 2) Sanjay - Assistant Vasco Manager 3) Baidah - F&B Attendant

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I stayed a night in Hilton KL on Sept 9, 2022. The staff there were all very very courteous and helpful and they made sure that my stay there was good and comfortable. Well done! Keep it up. Will definitely return for another stay.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: The hotel is located right next to the central station with all the public transport connection. The facilities are amazing especially the hotel pool. The customer service provided was also another level, especially Omar from the Front Desk!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Every staff member we encountered was gracious and helpful. Extreamly thanks to the Vasco's breakfast team who provided an unrivaled experience. Special mention to Fauzi, Ramlah, and Noor for the good service!. The hotel rooms and spaces are luxurious, beautiful, and welcoming. We felt so pampered and will always remember this lovely stay..

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Service was tip top.. Was attended to by Fauzi who took the time to explain about Hilton Honors and the benefits. Then the Assistant Outlet Manager Sanjay came to check if all was good and if the services are up to our expectations. My 2 great friends and I had a wonderful time, catching up with the latest news and the Chef specially made the cheese and garlic nan. We are very happy with the services though we can do with more variety of the desserts and I miss the soft ice cream.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: A really great hotel, awesome staff, very friendly. The train station is right underneath so super easy to get around malaysia and explore!! The rooms are super spacious and very clean and well appointed!! I need to make a special mention of the Amazing breakfast - possibly one of the best I’ve experienced in a hotel. Fauzi the host was outstanding!! And the exec chef also seedbed a special mention. At work on a Saturday, talking to all the guests to make sure they weee enjoying their breakfast. Amazing!!!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: The food is good and the service is excellent. The staff fauzi, noor , ramlah and haris were very kind and helpful. The food was good. Especially the kambing masak kicap was nice. But the choices quiet limited.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: We opted for King Deluxe Lake View room with breakfast. The room was spacious enough for 3 of us, and we had lovely buffet dinner at night. The service from Hilton staffs were very exceptional as usual. Throughout our stay, we requested for some additional coffee and bottled water and they delivered generous amount within no time! During breakfast, we were greeted by Fauzi, the restaurant team leader who was very informative and shared with us some promotional discounts & even tips on how make use of our Hilton Honors membership to the fullest, which we never really pay attention to. Thanks for the great tips Fauzi!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Good service from En Fauzi,Noor, Ramlah, Haris at Vasco restaurants . The room at executive suite was okay. Keep it up the services.Foods at vasco restaurants are good & varieties especially on breakfast.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I enjoy having breakfast in vasco , staff was super frendly and helpful , the staff name fauzi , noor , ramlah , pravin and haris was very helpful during my breakfast 😍 thank you for the staff because treat us super good🥰😍

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Needs some improvement on the housekeeping, not very well maintained. Stayed a couple of nights, overall the staff were helpful but i think they are grossly understaffed hence service was very very slow.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I would like to highlight the staff manning the moon cake sales counter Ms Emiley . She is very polite ; courteous and very friendly . We really enjoy our visit to Hilton hotel and when we have the opportunity to be served by Emiley , she always brighten up our visit... Thank You Emiley

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: staff service good and the food is good. special mentioned to Fauzi , adani, ramlah, haris and ahndu . Thanks to their services which improved our eating experience a lot another thing i enjoy id the good earing environment.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Fauzi,adani,ramlah,haris had the best service for us family at vascos ! Food was amazing ! Service was great and environment was fun ! Chef was an excellent help at assisting our allergies with food! Best place to dine at!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: For today family lunch enjoy ,first time food was nice lots of types .Does noodles was nice, roasted chicken was nice also.Pasta also nice,staf service was nice Fauzi,Ramlah,Adani,Ahnbu,Sanjai and Waran.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: My boss has been buying moon cakes from Hilton for our corporate guests every year. Each year, Encik Mohd Azmi the F&B Sales Team Leader would assist us in our purchase. He is very helpful, prompt and very accommodating in our requests. We also dined at the hotel, service was excellent. Food very tasty. Will definitely return again. Thank you very much Hilton Team.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Fast respond from Andrew (F&B Sales Manager of Hilton), Thanks again Good product quality Nice and high quality of packaging Gift card provided Perfect as a Mid Autumn gift for friends, clients, family

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: If you’re HH member and you’re asked to pay for an “upgrade” at the Hilton KL, you should probably not do so. Unfortunately I did; got the “Grand executive Suite” but the finishings are old and does measure up to what a Hilton suite is. But the hotel has got amazing staff who made the stay much more bearable. Executive Housekeeper Mr Faiz and his team - excellent! Mr Omar at the front desk; and the team on the executive floor, and finally the F&B team at Chyna and Chambers Grill - outstanding! Especially Thana and the chefs!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Stay at Hilton with my small family.Hilton have a nice swimming pool.My kids so lovely with the environment..The staff Shafar and Amir so nice person,friendly and excellent service.Thanks Shafar and Amir..we will come back again and highly recommended 👍👍👍

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: It’s our first time in this hotel. Noticed all staff are friendly. Thanks to Azan Mohamad Rizal Hamza(his around during breakfast) Nina (during evening cocktail) all the executive lounge team are superb. They make sure you are well taken care of. They really looked after my daughter. Kudos to all and hopefully we will be back soon.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I was served by Mr Elangovan. He is friendly. The food here is also amazing and the service excellent. I have come to Hilton KL many times and will keep on returning! The meal at Vasco’s never disappoints!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Ordered some mooncakes for gifting and very satisfied with the services of the team involved! The team members are Mohd Azmi (F&B Sales Team Leader), Vickneswaran (F&B Manager), June Kong (Assistant F&B Manager) and Samantha Ng (Assistant Manager). Thanks to the team who made the order and delivery process so seamless with the 5-star service throughout!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: We had a memorable wedding dinner at Chynna, Hilton KL @ Sentral. We would like to thank Andrew Teh, the F&B Sales Manager for assisting us from start till the end. Amelia, Chynna Manager and her staff for ensuring everything went on smoothly, and Chef Lam for his delicious off the menu recommendation. It was a much complimented event. Everything went well and the whole organization was pleased with the arrangement done by KL Hilton. My sincere thanks to you on that. Thank you again!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Excellent service provided by F&B team and special thanks to Mohd Azmi - F&B Sales Team Leader, June Kong - Assistant F&B Manager and Samantha NG - Assistant Manager very polite, and prompt services provided on our moon cake inquiry and delivering. We will visit again for next purchasing. Thank you everyone.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Im from room 3226, since I went to the lobby lounge, the lobby lounge staff name Sheril anida. Lady with a bun hair. She's lovely 👍🏻 Sheril anida do taken care of us since we were staying here. My wife loves the sweet wine that she has suggested. She have a great knowledge which means she's very attentive with a guests need. The food Murgh Makhanwala is so juicy & delicious. Perfect.. Well everytime me & my wife visited the lobby lounge, she was there never forget my wife's fav sweet & fruity wine. Good job to her! We were plan to staying here again for the next trip. Im not gonna forget to visit Sheril anida too & i will always make sure that she's gonna serve us again. Love, Walls Brenda.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Very nice service provide by F&B team and special thanks to Mohd Azmi - F&B Sales Team Leader, June Kong - Assistant F&B Manager and Samantha NG - Assistant Manager for extremely polite and provided a quick service on our moon cake inquiry and delivering. Thanks a lot to all of you.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Food was good. The staff there were very attentive and helpful especially Mohd Azmi - F&B Sales Team Leader, Suraya Amelia - Chynna Assistant Manager and Zuraini - F&B Attendant. Thanks, really appreciate it.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Not the best experience. If you’re young and Asian, you’ll probably get ignored at the Executive Lounge. Came here more than once during my 2-night stay and was consistently not provided the same service and attention that other guests got immediately when they arrived and stayed in the lounge. Is it stereotyping & discriminating? Not for me to determine. Other than this, the housekeeping staff were incredibly helpful, the breakfast food was wonderful, and the overall facilities seemed okay. Will probably try other places before returning.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Attended well by Azzu, Ramlah and Noor. They are chatty and friendly. Buffet served good spread to locals appetite. Tried almost all sections however the dimsum was unfortunately cold. But understood maybe due to high volume on weekend.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Excellent. Good service. Thank you Adani, Azu, Ramlah n Hareez for making our day. Great start to the morning. Excellent rapport. Refresh n very fulfilling. Invigorated. Will definitely come again. Suggestion-bring back the fresh fruit juices.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: This is a review of the Lobby Lounge where we had an afternoon snack. It was a very expensive tea/coffee at around RM38 a cup. We also had some cakes. Firstly, the service was very very slow. It was difficult to catch anybody’s attention to ask what was going on. When the tea came, I asked for some cold milk, but I got hot milk. When I asked to change it to what I had requested which was cold milk, there was no apology, just another long wait for the cold milk. The cakes came shortly after the tea and coffee but did it seem very fresh. Overall, it was a disappointment for the amount paid.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Thanks to aida,fauzi for good service and good food.view fantantic i will cameback soon.im will introduce to friends and familys members.im like it very varitey and a lots if choice.staff very friendly and im like it coffe taste

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I really like the dinner food at hotel because there are many choices and its very tasty..not forgetting the friendly service from the staff,especially the staff of haikal,azu,aiman and Sanjay..Thank you so much..

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: makanan sangat menyelerakan…banyak pilihan..dan selesa..tqvm to adli sanjay azu for the lovely hospitality and super buffet and superb foods and beverage will come again with my big family ………………….,,,

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Dinner with family at vasco restaurant was nice and good.really love pasta and curry laksa.staff was nice friendly and warm smile azu sanjay and aiman.very Talenten staff.we’ll train.will be back again for sure

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Really enjoyed 8 nights here. 3 Jansen Sentral. The train station is accessible from the hotel, 5 minutes walk. There is a mall there too. The food in the hotel is excellent. The staff are so friendly and helpful. The rooms are really clean. Little Indian is found by going through the Mall and turn to the right. Chinatown and a flea market is one stop from the train station and you can get a train from here to see the towers. If you want to use the hop on hop off bus you have to do it on line and book before trip as tickets go fast. Bus stop is outside to the right of the entrance of the towers beside the big bus stop with the Pretronas balls on top of it. Hope this helps.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: We had a wonderful stay here to celebrate our wedding anniversary. Team at executive lounge were so warm and welcoming. 5 star customer service. We loved our room and were surprised with a small cake and some balloons..so thoughtful! Food and drinks were excellent as well. Highly recommended!!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Stayed at Hilton KL for 4 nights with my family. The service crew from bell boys, front desk and staff at the executive lounge was excellent. Special thanks to Azrin ( from executive lounge) who took good care of us. My daughter also loved the pool at level 8 and the food from the iketeru japanese restaurant. Hotel is super accessable by KLIA express/transit. Nu Sentral is also located within walking distance. Keep it up Hilton KL.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: The hotel location is fantastic and so close to shops and transportation. Staff are welcoming and everyone working there made us feel welcome. Breakfast buffet had a wonderful array of local and international delights. The room was upgraded, which was a lovely surprise and it was really spacious and grand.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: We had a wonderful experience at Vasco's Restaurant.The food was good, the ambience was nice, and the service was excellent .Special thanks to Mohd Azmi F&B Sales Team Leader for the dinner arrangements, Sanjay Assistant Manager Vasco for the delightful customer service.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: a very smooth n professional team by Hilton KL handling our mooncake order this year. kudos to: 1) Mohd Azmi - F&B Sales Team Leader 2) June Kong - Assistant F&B Manager 3) Samantha NG - Assistant Manager my boss n our clients all satisfied with the overall deals. thank you. (from Nisma - Kenanga)

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Good dinner places ,marvellous food.Tonight special meals was salmon wellington which so good and the wagyu beef was so tasty. Excellence services from the staffs especially Sanjay, Fauzi, Azu, Baidah and also the chef’s team. Thumbs up for your guys.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Food was great and delicious. Seafood really fresh. Not forget, thanks to friendly staff's service by azu, sanjay, fauzi, baidah and chef's team. They serve me with smile. I would recommend this place to my friends.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: The service in hilton never failed to amaze me. The staff are very accommodating.you should try the buffet at night. You will surely be very satisfied. Thanks to Sanjay, Azu and Fauzi for their excellent service! I will definitely come back

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: The staycation was very pleasant and enjoyable. The last minute reservation was very helpful by all the staff till we get the right table. Thank you hilton team ; ms Azzu , mr sanjay and mr fauzi. Our child birthday was a very meaningful one to our family at your place.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: The service offered was beyond expectations as they provide top services especially Harris as he seems to know exactly what he’s doing and ready to handle any situation occurred. They all seems warm and approachable in providing assistance and service.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Great food, service, excellent customer service.. easy check-in.. enjoy the facility & all. Service by sanjai, azu, baidah, elan, adli. Life demo cooking, walking distance to mall. Great view & hospitality, friendly staff.. & definitely will come back soon

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: We recently stayed at the Hilton in KL. It was a fantastic hotel, the staff were friendly and hospitable. The food was great and all the facilities available to us. The pool was beautiful and the kids loved it. Would highly recommend.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: A four-year break in visiting the Hilton KL (partly due to the pandemic) and were eager to see how the hotel is doing these days. Booked for a week and no regrets nor worries there: Hilton Kuala Lumpur is still solid and very reliable with superb staff. Fantastic check-in on Wednesday, 03rd August, by a lovely reception team around 6 PM, and the rest of the stay has been equally delightful from the very first moment we stepped into the house: lovely staff members at all stations - reception, breakfast, concierge & bell boys, pool, restaurants - and although the Hilton has been in the business quite a few years already, the public areas as well as the rooms are very well-maintained. The overall ambiance oozes quality and the staff seem to be very eager to provide a great Hilton…

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Have good experience for a night stay at Hilton KL. The staff service is very good and helpful. Special thanks and appreciation to EF Team, Mr Azan and Rizal. Definitely will pay a visit again in the nearest future.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Wide variety of choices in the buffet dinner and great service. Range from local to international cuisine. Shout out to the following staff with great service: Mohd Azmi - F&B Sales Team Leader Noor - Outlet Manager Vasco Azu , Jai & Harris

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Staff very helpful from Azu and Fauzi..Not just them few crew also nice and polite with a guest.From chef side i would like to say excellent service especially chef safri,haziqah,izah and few of them.Food very nice and delicious.Totally service is 5 star.Will repeat again.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: One of the best hotels in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia ~ great location; great service and great breakfast! Staff is very responsive and helpful. The rooms are very comfortable. It is convenient to travel to and from KLIA.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: This was our first stay at the Hilton KL in many years and it's amazing to see the refurbishments since, and how the property is so well maintained even after all these years. Still so very highly recommended and the very friendly Hotel Manager managed to upgrade us as a Diamond Hilton Honors member. The suite we had was spacious, very clean, comfortable and everything we would expect from the very best five star hotels. Truly stands out as one of the very (few) well maintained and run truly 5 star hotels that stand the test of time. Lovely Executive Lounge with plenty of food and drinks on offer during tea time and pre-dinner cocktails. Our son loved the slide at the pool and we had a lovely lunch at Iketeru (highly recommend the wagyu beef teppanyaki) and enjoyed the taste…

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I recently travelled to Kuala Lumpur for an official trip. Stayed at Hilton KL Sentral. The Room was awesome. Well maintained, Neat and Clean. Includes Bath Tub, Separate shower and Separate Toilet. Not many hotels in this range will offer so many amenities in 1 room. The bed was super comfy, after a hard long day a much needed one. There is a big television, sofa with pillows, a table for work, big cupboards, locker and more.. Forgot to mention the Breakfast, amazing spreads with different varieties and helpful staff.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Central located convenient, room and services is great but only area of improvement is the room and surrounding Wi-Fi .. keep dropping and need to reconnect. Breakfast buffet selection is general reasonable but if you stay more than three it can be boring as no changes

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: This is new experience for me in hotel environment, have a very good breakfast in vasco the staff very friendly especially haris adani waran ahnbu fauzi . Got lots of choice and also to the pool team very good and helpful.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Have a very good stay , what a nice and wonderful hotel , this is my first time stay here , kuddos to the vasco team fauzi , ahnbu , adani , waran , haris done a very good job and the pool team are very friendly and good shafar and amir , thank you guys

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Sathya took care of us with the room reservations when we checked in on the 33rd floor. The lounge staff were very friendly and efficient particularly Parameswari who was humble, very polite and efficient always. The staff in the breakfast area were always doting on us. Reception and concierge staff were ready to help when needed. We enjoyed the food at breakfast. Thank you very much from my family and me!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Newly remodelled and with great facilities and excellent service. Its dissapointing that the food is hit and miss. Sampled the lunch buffet offerings with friends and the odds of you choosing something good and tasty vs bland and tasteless is 50/50.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: We just had a farewell lunch for our Director at Vasco Restaurant Hilton today. Great food and ambience and good hospitality provided by En. Mohd Azmi - F&B Sales Team Leader and Mr. Ahbu - Vasco Outlet Manager. Selection of food was excellent. Overall it was a pleasant experience for all 35 of us.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I had an average stay here over 2 days. Check in was rather disappointing. I had booked a King Executive Room with Lake View. I arrived at 4pm but was told my room was not ready. The check in staff offered me another room which was not a Lake View. I was shocked with the suggestion as this would be a downgrade from the room I had booked. I of course refused this and said I would wait in the lounge until my room was ready. I was brought to the lounge and then told that my room was actually ready. Not sure why I was informed otherwise at the reception. Could be they just wanted to downgrade me? The credit card machine was also not working at check in so the hotel could not collect a deposit and I could not charge anything to the room. This was rather inconvenient. The room I was…

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Great food and variety of cuisine to savour. Selection of seafood was impressive. Our party of 16 enjoyed the hospitality and service of staff. Kudos to Mohd Azmi F&B sales leader for making the booking process a smooth and pleasant experience and for catering to our requirements.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: we enjoy the service tht served by charuni and raja adli and adam, and the food was very good and delicious. The staff was really kind and willing to attend any request. Alongside thoughtful amenities and general comfort, an efficient staff that excels at personal attention is a must-have for all hotels. for sure will come again

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Interaction with staff made a hugely positive impression every time, from arrival at the hotel, to check in, the very attentive teams at the executive lounge (big thank you to Syamim), at Vasco’s and the poolside restaurant (thank you to Amir). The property is fantastic with multiple restaurants, a massive (!) breakfast buffet at Vasco’s with local and continental choices, a fun pool separated into saltwater and chlorine sections shared with the neighboring property. Didn’t use the gym (but had room service LOL - which served generous portions of food). The executive lounge offers views to both sides of the building, rotating meal/snack options and drinks (incl. alcoholic options in the evening) and the staff there can help you with anything in the hotel. We even ordered room…

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Buffet dinner the best .. !! all food delicious .. good servis from Adli , sanjey , chef rasdan and all staff .. The best Hilton hotel in kuala lumpur .. really happy for the service,keep it up all team ..

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Megat, the hotel service staff, is very friendly and helpful throughout my entire experience in KL Hilton! He has been a life saver, and also very patient and nice! I would come back KL Hilton with this amazing exceptional service from Megat!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: A big thank you to the whole of Executive Lounge team despite being so busy during Hari Raya Haji festive period. You maintain your professionalism, smile, your heartfelt service, truly 5 stars service! ! Special thanks to Nani for creating lots of magic before and during my stay! Lastly, all of you look amazing with your traditional (and yet modern) baju and kebaya outfit!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Excellent spread, fresh from the wok, a variety of cuisine to choose from. Definitely coming again. Friendly staff, Baidah, Waran, Ahnbu, Azu & Sanjai. I came with my 2 year old daughter, she thoroughly enjoyed herself.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Food so much variety & taste of food with rating 10/10.Enjoy our breakfast with premium food like fresh salmon. Waiters & waitress was delightful to serve us & very helpful.Good job for Sanjai,Ramlah,Azu,Aiman,Waran & Elan

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Very warm welcome and preparation from Raja Adli, Annbu, Adani, Jawahir and Haikal. The team are fantastic from kitchen to plate. Never been once this hotel disappoint me. Maybe glitches here and there but excellent will not exist without mistakes. Good job Raja Adli and team..WELL DONE

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Various Sarawak delicacies The noodles were good with flavourful sambal The steam rice however could have cooked better. The staffs were very helpful.The manager was deligently serving the geusts for assistance Wish to thank the team for making our visit memorable Sanjai -AM Ramlah Aiman Fauzi Waran

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Was there for a friends gathering, great selection of food on the breakfast spread! Service was also great by the staff, especially Sanjai, who offered to take a group picture of us! Will definately visit again!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Very good service from the crew from entrance to table end to end. I add on breakfast by call to operator, but haven’t reflected in the system when i went down for breakfast. The staff sat me down, but without me asking, he reconfirmed again with me whether i add on by walk in or call in. Very satisfied as i was worried he add on by walk in which the price is a little bit higher than the call in price. Am very happy with the service. Also took a photo with him. Friendly person. Crew names Sanjai Ahnbu Adam Baidah Adani Well done!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Ultimately, I would express my special appreciation and congrats, to Ms. Kristine Chan (Hotel Manager), Mr. Rizki Triananda (Front Office Manager), Mr. Kazi Hassan (Executive Chef), Mr. Rasdan (Chef Vasco), Mr. Raja Adli (F&B Assistant Manager) and the whole team who always makes our stays so great, awesome and cheerful. First of all, I really appreciate excellent service by Mr. Rizki who helped me on reservation 2 weeks before check-in. Mr. Rizki hospitality during our stays were really great, even though he is busy with his works but he will make sure stop by even few seconds to say hi and chat a moment. I always hats off to Mr. Rizki on his caring service and hospitality. I feel like being back at full service before COVID-19 pandemic. We really enjoyed and grateful to Chef…

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Food was good and the lounge was packed with full of guest mostly all the table has been taken , what’s makes me feel Surprised only 2 person on the service floor , even my food takes about 45 minutes staff were very humble and polite and sincerely apologies to me on the shortfall of the service , even lack of the timeframe of the serving the food but the staff were so attentive even their short of staff. Kudos to the staff and my bad I didn’t get the staff name , one Malay girl wearing tudung. Hopefully can rectify the staffing issue .

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Excellent service and freshest food! A wide array of fruit at their incredible breakfast buffet where I was greeted with a smile and a plate of Jack fruit everyday (thank you Adam)!!! Most notably, service by Adam, Adani, Ahnbu, Chef Wai Lum, Sanjay, and Pravin was outstanding! Looking forward to returning here soon!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Really enjoyed our stay here, and face masks apart, it was like being back at a full service hotel before COVID struck. Good service, large well appointed rooms, fantastic location for public transport (and airport train) and the best hotel breakfast offering imaginable. If I had a negative it would be the Executive Lounge which isn't anything special. But overall, we cannot wait to return.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Great hospitality, great food, great staff, Welcomed warmly. ! Special thanks to Mr Muiz, Mr Sanjay, Mr Haikal, Ms Baidah, Mr Fauzi & the rest of vasco crew, your service most appreciated ! Food is fantastic ❤️

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: We could not wait to be back to one of our favourite hotels in SE Asia. We had to cancel a trip in May 2020 and we came as soon as Malaysia opened its borders. On check in, we were given a smoking room ( my mistake!). We only realised this when we entered the room. We quickly left and went up to the lounge on 33rd floor. Shahril, quickly changed allocated rooms and we were given a room overlooking the lake ( greatly appreciated Shahril!). Shahril and his team in the lounge took great care of us during our stay. I am very pleased to note that the service is as excellent as it was pre covid! Thank you for the wonderful stay and we are looking forward to be back in the very near future

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: This hotel is perfection - location, ambience, and amenities. Perfectly located in the KL SENTRAL train station near to various restaurants and attractions. Room is just right with all the basic needs you ask for. There’s a hot tub, shower, and amazing views of the city. My favorite area is the pool. The view is breathtaking with amazing buildings of the nearby hotels. Check in and check out are fast and efficient - no hassle. This is highly recommended to all during your KL visit!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: We are staying at the Hilton and went to the Buffet for supper. Sandji was pleasant, fluently English and introduced us to all of the many delicacies that the Buffet provided. The steamed fish with ginger was wonderful. Great food, great staff and great experience.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: very good service , excellent and happy thanks to sanjai fauzi haikal muiz baidah you’re awesome !! and food very lovely test , delicious !! thank you chefs team chef safri chef rasdan chef kumar chef raj chef firdaus

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Dinner Buffet spread is here so good!! Variety is plenty. There's local, fresh seafood, Japanese teppanyaki and western too! Churros are a must try - so gooood!! Staff is super friendly too! Thanks to Sanjai, Fauzi, Muiz, Haikal, and Baidah.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: All the LRT. MRT. Konuter Train and Monorail Services pass thru KL Sentral where Hilton is located. Good connectivity. Other than the crappy Concierge Dept headed by Ronald, everything else was of Hilton par excellence. Lovely to return to Hilton hospitality for my leisure travel after 3 long years of pandemic travel restrictions.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: The lunch was marvelous. We came in a big group with 30 people all together welcoming the newlyweds. Noor was very attentive & helpful, managed to get tables despite having a sitting issue in the beginning. The food was amazing as they serve the dessert & tomahawk from table to table is really the key takeaway!. Thank you Adam, Ahnbu, Waran, Noor, Muizz & both Chef Rasdan & Wai Lun for the amazing service! We’re so full enjoy the good occasion

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Theres a variety of delicious food served like Japanese, Italian, Western, Chinese, Malay. What makes the experience better is the super efficient & friendly service. Special thanks to the team; Adam, Ahnbu, Muizz, Noor and Thanga for the awesome work. Props to the chefs; Chef Rasdan & Chef Wai Lun for the top tier and unforgettable food. The activities prepared for Father's day also makes the experience unforgettable and totally worth it.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: The food and the service is good, i want to personally thank ADAM, AHNBU, NOOR, HAIKAL and RASDAN. They gave me the best service and hospitality. I am very happy that i spent my father's day here at the vasco's. Highly recomended and when you are here pls look for the people i mentioned.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Very nice and satisfied with the service by Sanjai, Ahnbu, Azu, Jai & Baidah. Their wahyu beef by chef Rasdan & chef Leo is very nice. Overall all are good and satisfactory and we really recommend this place.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Excellent service and delicious food.. Never failed to come down to have a good meal and a chat. Big thanks to Adam for my morning coffees, Noor, Ahnbu, Adani, Ramlah and Chef Wat Lun.. Will definitely stay here again for our next visit!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Had a staycation over here. Was taken aback by the standard of hygiene and cleanliness. The rubbish from the rooms filled the hallways, seems more like a dorm than hotel. Expected more from the Hilton brand, but nonetheless the stay was decent, rooms were nice.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Its been 3 years since we last celebrated our anniversary and we’re excited and also nervous to be back here. Not sure what and how its gonna be post Covid routine. CHECK IN - Our check in was smooth done by Rizal, very professional and candid at the same time, loved the warmth welcome and he sent us up to the lounge since out room wasn ready. Am glad he did, esp aft 2hrs travel frm PD, we kinda need some coffee to hype up. Attended by Sherry and Heman, it was the start of a warmth hospitality. Made a great choice w the room and we had a splendid view of the lake and being in the corner supercedes everything. Thank u for the complimentary cake and nuts, i believe it was for us celebrating our Anni there, again. EXEC LOUNGE - We didn know abt the long weekend so we were…

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Currently on Night 5 of a 6 night stay in a deluxe room on the 10th floor. Pros: -Lobby is fantastic / Upto the Hilton quality. -Breakfast is great. For a buffet its extensive with lots of live cooking stations. -We've ordered food from Vascos plenty of times ans its been great quality in room dining. -Location Right on the door of KL Sentral. Probably the biggest benefit. Everything is clearly marked and a very good mall just outside. -all the employees are very nice and welcoming -the magic concierge system is pretty great. Always prompt and responsive to any queries The other restaurants are good also. Pool is a little small but thats the city centre for you. - few issues with housekeeping but Zorhalif and Asri went above and beyond to resolve them. Bog thank you you them. …

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Wide selection of foods. The fresh oyster, salmon and shrimp are my fav. The food taste was great, especially the Angus Beef served by Chef Rasdan & Chef Safri. The team are friendly and give the best service. I got to know each one of them Adam, Ahnbu, Baidah and Haikal. This is not my first time at Vasco and i will definitely come again with my fanily. Thank you Vasco!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Wan Auni: Dinner at iketeru hilton, japanese restaurant at hilton klSeafood fried rice was sooo delicious & the waiters are friendly & nice🥹❤️ thankyou Ms Azura , Mr Alam & Mr Khai💓 very welcoming … will come again later with the rest of family😍 the citrus sorbet wasss goooooddd

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Great service by the team and always very well received. Lounge was outstanding and room impeccable. The location of this hotel in Sentral is very convenient. Looking forward to many returns to enjoy.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Stayed in a King plus room, comes with a king bed and a sofa day bed, which can fit one medium heightl adult. Three of us adults were allowed in the room. Room is comfy. Pros 1. Convenient, across the road from KL sentral 2. Room is big, clean and new. 3. A large gym and reasonable size swimming pool 4. Most of the staff were friendly 5. Breakfast at RM49 if you are a hotel guests (RM89) Cons 1. Came across a staff who was not so friendly. 2. Free Wi-Fi only if you sign as hhonors member 3. Some slips in housekeeping. Only half a roll of toilet paper provided only upon check-in. On another day of housekeeping, toiletries were not provided, shampoo, conditioner, body lotion and tea bags.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Breakfast selection is great! The team consisting of Sanjai, Azu, Adam, Ahnbu and Adli was wonderful and on the ball! Thumbs up. Teh tarik and masala thosai tasted very nice. Feels good to be back after 2 years. 👍🏽

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: The Front Desk and Concierge team extended warm welcome to me plus they were willing to ask if I needed any help without having to approach them. Highlight! F&B team wowed me by calling my name and Chef Wai Lun at breakfast, surprised me by giving me the chilli paste I had asked the day before and directly gave it to me the next day as he remembered that it was me who asked for it. Being personalized and well taken care of, is making them outstanding. Keep up the excellent work and be more inspirational, well done Hilton Kuala Lumpur! :)

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Loved the dining options.Still top-notch. Superb & friendly service from Adli & David while dining & thereafter. Room was comfy. Room service was prompt. Check in & check out was fuss free just the way I like it & remembered

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Took my family to Hilton KL this evening. We were very impressed by their spread on the buffet table. From the salad bar all the way down to the dessert table, the presentation and variety was superb. The food also tasted very good even though the variety was extensive. A big shoutout to the service from the staff as well, especially En Raja Adli and team for being so attentive and efficient. Another thing to look out for is their roast tomahawk trolley that goes table to table to serve guests!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: After 2 1/2 years I was back at Hilton KL and the staff was even more friendly than before. They are all very helpful, friendly and professional. The service in terms of breakfast etc. was downsized a bit, I guess as a result of the pandemic, but it is still very good. Being a Diamond member I was upgraded to a very nice suite and had access to the executive lounge. The staff at the lounge especially Ryan and Syed Alief were very professional and friendly and always at everyones service, whatever little matter it was. Everything was solved in a discreet and nice manner and always very guest oriented. The pool was nice as well and it was not too busy. As usual I felt home away from home! Thank you!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: *Sorry for a long review but I needed the WORLD to know my unforgettable experience* This was a stay that was important to me as I was about to face my Doctoral oral examination during a day of the intended stay. As usual, I arrived and went straight to the Reception. Upon arrival, I was welcomed by the staff on duty. As my last stay here was somewhere in December 2021, I was met with either new faces manning the Reception or staff that I have not met before during my numerous previous stays. Having clocked over 30 nights stay for the year 2021, my presence at the hotel was usually welcomed with cheerful "welcome back" greeting from familiar faces - but this was not the case during this stay. The girl named Ms Aisyah was probably new and did not recognise me (which was not a…

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Hilton is still a pretty good hotel and the location is centralized, except the lobby can be rather confusing for some taxi drivers. Room size is decent with an extra large king bed which provides a relatively comfortable sleep. Swimming pool was sort of a S shape

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Wonderful and tasty food, friendly and always smiley staff especially Mr Sanjai, Mr Pavin, Ms Noor, Chef Thinesh, Chef Kumar, Chef Wai Lun for give a special pass around for foods and drinks today. Plus with very nice and cozy ambient. Rcommended for the whole family breakfast experience

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: There are many selection you can choice and prepare by yourself , no matter it is Chinese, western or mala…etc. and drinks as well, specially coffee white. Service is excellent, they well knew what you need and serve you immediately without any delay . Thanks to Adam, Ahnbu, Noor, Ramallah, and Chef Kumar during I stayed in Hotel more than 20 days.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Muhamad Rizal was a superb host on the executive floor, always with a friendly smile, and humorous and friendly disposition. After a long day of work he was able to help us to relax with a laugh, but always very professional.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Return visit to KL Hilton. So convenient to station for airport express train. Always made so welcome by the superb staff - doing such a good job to provide personalised service and hospitality. It gives such a positive impression to a foreign tourist. I always really enjoy my stays at this hotel. Treated so well as a Lifetime Diamond Honors member. Keep up the good work and look forward to many return visits in the future. Special mention to all at Reception Desk - always so friendly and welcoming. Thanks for doing such a good job!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Food and service was great! Special thanks to Sanjai, Adam, Ahnbu, Adani, Ramlah, Prabin, Chef Kumar, Chef Thinesh, Chef Pey Yee! Definitely a good place and i enjoyed my staycation here with husband. Worth every penny!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Very pleasant stay here in km Hilton with very nice experience.. Food was good..breakfast was excellent Staff are friendly..thanks to Sanjai,Adam, ahnbu, Adani, ramlah, pravin, chef Kumar, Thinesh, pey Yee.. Will come back again. Keep up the good service

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Food are good. Nasi lemak sedap. Air pun sedap. Good service by sanjai, adam, pravin, ramlah, noor, chef kumar, chef thinesh Fresh omelete fresh roti canai n thosai, kuih2. Room very nice. Food delicious

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I had a pelasant stay at hilton KL and next day had a Good breakfast with Great service from the entire staff.i Hope Will have a chance to visit this hotel again.The variety of the food choices are nice. Great service from Team Leader Sanjay,Adam,Pravin,Ramlah,Noor,chef Thinesh and chef kumar

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Great stay as always. Beautiful 5-star hotel with direct train link to the airport. The staff: Adam, Ahnbu, Sanjai & Noor, plus Chef Thinesh, were all very friendly & helpful. Looking forward to next visit.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: The hotel place near with public transport. Easy for who was travel to kl. Hotel environment very clean and the smell also nice. The staff also very helpful and polite. For the food also very good. Sure I will come again. Rate service for the team : Sanjai, Adam, Pravin, Ramlah, Noor, Chef Thinesh, Chef Kumar.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Our first visit to this hotel, having previously used Sheraton Imperial as our base when in KL. This hotel is very accessible from KLIA via KLIA Express/link to KL Sentral then an easy walk to reception. Check in was smooth and easy, given all the information we needed for our stay. Our suite was superb, fabulous views and very spacious. Probably the best room we have had the pleasure of staying in, and the shower takes the biscuit - amazing. Loads of storage space, even for two suitcase which for once didn’t have to stacked on top of each other. Full size dining table and comfy sofa and chairs. The best. Service and quality in the executive lounge was very good indeed, with quality wines and spirits on offer between the hours of 6-8pm alongside a good variety of canapés to help…

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: It's a great joy having breakfast at Vasco's with a team of smiling staff keeping my child entertained. Kudos to Chef Thinesh, Chef Wai Lun, Noor, Sanjai, Adani, Baidah, Waran and Pravin for your 5 star service.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Rizal and Azan from the EFL Team both had been very helpful with us during happy hours and assisting us to check out as well. Friendly and helpful staffs and would definitely come back to visit again.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: The team of sanjai, adani, waran, ahnbu, baidah, Adam, chef thinesh and chef wai Lun has done a good job in serving sumptuous and wide variety of spread. Would love to come again whenever visiting Kuala Lumpur.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Coffee and the food bar has lots of variety. Curry mee, Nasi lemak, fried beehon , eggs bar , bread bar,are good just to name a few. The staffs service are quite good and efficient.The coffee staff Sanjay is very helpful

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Cerebrated my birthday here. Food was amazing. Great atmosphere. Very good job and amazing kitchen team consist of 1. Sanjai 2. Noor 3. Adani 4. Baidah 5. Waran 6. Pravin 7. Chef Thinesh ⭐️ 8. Chef Wai Lun ⭐️

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: The staff was very friendly and attentive! Thanks for the great experience to Sanjai, Adam, Ahnbu, Adani, Waran, Baodah, and the chef Pey Yee. My family and I were happy to stay here and have our bonding together

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: great food and service by the team. come for their hari raya buffet and the food was great such as sayur lodeh and their rendang. kudos to the chef: chef kumar and chef pey yee. Also thank you so much for the service given by Sanjai, Adam, ahnbu, waran and also pravin! will definitely come by again !!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Good, taately and very friendly staff. Thanks to chef Kazi, Sanjai, Adam, Ahnbu, Waran, Pravin, chef Kumar, chef pet yie and everyone else at KL Hilton. Nice dishes includes pumpkin soup, fresh seafood, curry noodle etc. Keep up the good work!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: The breakfast buffet was amazing! Huge spread with lots of variety, and the staff kept the food well-stocked. Costs RM49 if you purchase with your booking, or if you call the front desk beforehand, or RM80+ if you walk in. Shoutout to the staff: Sanjai, Adam, Ahnbu, Waran, Pravin, Chef Kumar, Pey Yee for a great breakfast service!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I would like to compliment the Hilton Sentral Vasco’s restaurant team for a wonderful breakfast experience at their restaurant. The menu choice, with a wide variety of Malaysian and Western cuisine and fruits is simply amazing. Thank you to Ahnbu, Adam, Sanjay and Pravin for the excellent service and experience.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Food very good Service by sanjay adam ahnbu baidah adli waran chef pee yee and shamsul. Nasi lemak very nice. We also like mee curry and dim sum. Teh tarik good. Room okay overall .staff very friendly and good service

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Service was top notch. Staff (Chef Kumar, Adam, Sanjay, Ahnbu, Waran, Pravin), friendly and courteous. Food selection was good (a bit pricey for walk-ins. Paid RM352 for 4 people). Happy tummy 😁😁😁. Good overall experience. Will comeback.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Enjoyed the breakfast all 9 days.. tried all the possible cuisines on the menu.. and everything was top notch and the hospitality was outstanding. Special thanks to: Adam, Ahnbu,Sanjai and Waran.. this will be memorable for me.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: We stayed in Executive Room Plus to celebrate our Wedding Anniversary. - Bell hops Upon arrival, Bell hops were quick to attend to our luggage and made us feel welcomed. - Check in As we arrived early, we were hoping for early check-in but was informed by front desk that our room is not ready. Being a Hilton member and having booked into one of the executive rooms, I am surprised front desk made not mention of the lounge at Level 33 until prompted. Executive Lounge While awaiting for our room, we were then whisked off to Executive Lounge and we enjoyed the view with iced- cold juices and light snacks. We were greeted warmly by the staff there. Lunch at Iketeru - Nice ambiance, Great service, Good food. Pool - My son enjoyed the water slide very much but it can get…

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Had our buffet lunch during Mother’s Day. We are so enjoy about the event and food provided for Mother’s Day! My mum love it so much !will visit again next time!buffet quality is excellent also , and we love the taste of food!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Amazing variety! Amazing food! Amazing staff! Friendly! Just superb! Would recommend to anyone food lovers out there! Satisfaction guaranteed! Customer service is tip top, not to mention the atmosphere and environment is elegant and squeaky clean. The view is also breathtaking!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Good PR and best foods!!! 5 stars for me, friendly environment and good views. The staffs is all amazing and friendly. You will enjoy ur stay and foods. Must try!!! Nearby the KL sentral. Easy access way to city

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I love the buffet breakfast here..Amazing..The service is awesome..The food is the best.. the environment is nice..highly recommended for those who love food and also who comes for service. Staff is friendly & helpful

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Having a nice stay at hilton KL with a good service from all staff. Having a great service at Hilton lounge with a good and trained staff. Breakfast foods are very nice to eat with international coarse.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Had a 1 day 1 night stay here. Such a very friendly service especially by one of the staff Mr. Raja Adli. Such an unforgettable stay here even just 1 day. Will go to the pool after the breakfast thats for sure!! Thxxx Hilton and all the staffs for all the marvelous services!!!!!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Good service by Fauzi,Raja Adli , Adam , Ramlah, And haikal and Good food All stuff are friendly. Very nice place Good and quiet room very Comfortable. I like so much local tea tarik . Have a nice view .

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: the breakfast is great, worth every penny. there’s strawberry croissants & it’s very good. everything is delicious and variety of foods. the room & bathroom are pretty. the service also tip top. mr. fauzi & the receptionist are very friendly. will repeat my staycation here. the pool has a very beautiful view.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: this is my 1st stay at hilton KL i feel so enjoyable during my Raya stay, Room so comfortable feel like at home.. breakfast experience at vascos it’s amazing! a lot of choices, friendly staff, thanks to especially Mr Fauzi, Haikal,Ramlah and noor.. nice ambiance, thanks again i will come again next time!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Overall its a very nice experience. Awesome stay! Room are incredible. Food are its best. When we arrived, we are greet with warn welcome by the staff. The receptionist Omar is very kind to me in assisting. Fauzi & Raja Adli also very kind and sweet. Chef Tinesh also is the master in serving nasi lemak. Love it!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: 1) I really like the room and i like the car valet service, its fast and have friendly staff 2) I like my room view,it was a city view and i can see the LRT and i can see people walking down the street from my room. 3) The most i like is Level 33, is serve food for hi tea and i love the fruit and eat it with city ciew.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: excellent food and services. pray my busines will prosper and will come again. The staff service very freindly, warm and well comunicated especially MR Raja Adli, Fauzi, Noor , Haikal and Ramlah. The Chef Thinesh , Wai Lun seems engage with clients and asking feedback from us. Thank you very much.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I have take noodles and omelette. They were good and fresh to be cooked in front of me! A lot of friendly staff be here especially FAUZI-san Thanks him to bring me a coffee and Teh Tarik: that is my first time to try. I have an amazing experience with that!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I can't believe they have red velvet croissants here ✨ Apart from that, they do have every ideal breakfast plate you could've ever think of. Sunny side up is my favourite here. Tried it twice. Encik Adli, Puan Nor, Fauzi, Ramlah dan Haikal are very friendly. I also love the chefs, they greet us well and they're very friendly. They are very efficient. They ran out of orange juice and they immediately served it to our table, it's just a minor inconvenience but they are great to take quick action. Would recommend if you want good food and good company, stay here peeps.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: This is my second time staying here for a family vacation. Very friendly staff; Encik Fauzi was very helpful <3 Breakfast is delicious and there's various of food available. The environment looks luxurious and glamorous and i love it. Lovely hotel would love to visit here again.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: I had a great time with my Kaala Lumpur here. Facilities were good everything needed to make a great time with my Kaaleys. Pool swim was good with my Kaaleya. Bedroom facilities all in good order with my Kaaleya S Shahzadi

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Everything's good from room service, cleanliness, location, price and of cause the selection of restaurants available inside. Front desk is also very helpful in accommodating to our request such as additional mineral waters at no extra charge. Little things like this is what made this Hotel stand out compared to the others.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: After greetings! I would like to share my one of the best experiences at Hilton, the restaurant staff were extremely nice and friendly, i would like to give credit to their professionalism and for everything they did, especially Mr.Fauzi, Mr.Annuar, and Mr.Yusri! Thank you!

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: After almost 3 years of absence in Kuala Lumpur due to the Covid19 pandemic, this is my first review of this hotel in 2022. 💳Check in 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 I used the ERL KLIA Express service from KLIA to KL Sentral after considering traffic and time factors. Took about 10 mins walk from KL Sentral to the hotel's lobby. I was greeted by the Concierge staff named Zul at the lobby and my luggage was quickly taken. As soon as I stepped at the Front Desk in the Executive Lounge on 33rd Floor, I was warmly greeted by Rizal. We had a little chat for a few minutes, later he invited me to take a seat in the EL room and asked another staff member named Syed to take our order while my room reservation was being prepared. After a while he came and gave me a room access card along with a thank you…

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: My friends and I when for dinner buffet in Hilton Kuala Lumpur on 31/3/22, surprising the food are Very good and yummy, I love their Sushi and oyster Very much and so fresh. And the service by the crew was superb and Very friendly Thanks to Ramlah, biadah, noor, adam and fatihah for their hospitality… definately will visit again.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: First and foremost I would love to commend the team headed by mr rizal mr syed Alif ms Nurul Nadzirah and chef Hamzah for our stay and 5 class treatment at the executive lounge in kl Hilton. They went above and beyond to make our stay pleasurable, they always greeted us with a smile and they made my family and friends feel very much at home. The food was excellent. I especially loved the vegetarian aglio olio, the spinach pakora, the deconstructed brownie, lemon butter cake and generous servings of bailey’s, gin and tonic and Prosecco. The team were very warm, engaging and all my friends felt so welcomed. The views as well of the lounge on the 33rd floor and the executive king’s plus suite was incredible. Coupled with the location in the heart of KL, a good concierge, excellent…

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: Tq Ramlah, Sanjay, Baidah, Jai, Sutha & Muiz... such as wonderful staff. Great hospitality. Good Food, friendly staff. Tq for always being good to us and nice iftar experience here. Will come back for next visit. I will recommend to my friend & relatif.

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: The food was amazing the stuff are kind and so friendly and provides us the food we like i would like say thanks 🙏 to : Annnar Pravin Adanir Fatinah Chef pey yee Chef fizi Chef thinesh Yusri Hankal..

address: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur 50470 Malaysia
name: Hilton Kuala Lumpur
reviews.text: The hotel is in a ideal location for us across the road from the main train station so the airport is easy to reach. There is also a shopping mall next to the station. Hilton is always buzzing with people. We have been coming to KL for many years and have tried a few places to stay, but we can’t fault the Hilton. They make us feel welcome every time we visit. The restaurants are good with very good food and good breakfast. The pool is long and has a bar. Staff at the Club floor are superb and spoil you completely. Keep up the good work.
